entry.title: Drude Theory
entry.content:
假设

$1.$ 电子具有特征散射时间 $\tau$，其在时间$\dd t$内被散射的概率为$\displaystyle\frac{\dd t}{\tau}$

$2.$ 电子被散射后动量变为零

$3.$ 在散射间隔之内电子受外部电磁场$\boldsymbol{E}$和$\boldsymbol{B}$影响

由上述假设有

$$\boldsymbol{p}(t+\dd t)=(1-\dd t/\tau)(\boldsymbol{p}(t)+\boldsymbol{F}\dd t)\\
\qquad\\
\frac{\dd \boldsymbol{p}}{\dd t}=\boldsymbol{F}-\frac{\boldsymbol{p}}{\tau}$$

$\boldsymbol{F}=-e(\boldsymbol{E}+\boldsymbol{v}\times\boldsymbol{B})$，在无外场条件下电子动量呈指数衰减$\boldsymbol{p}(t)=\boldsymbol{p}_0e^{-t/\tau}$

电场

稳态下$\displaystyle\frac{\dd\boldsymbol{p}}{\dd t}=0$，$\boldsymbol{p}=-e\tau\boldsymbol{E}$
$\boldsymbol{j}=-ne\boldsymbol{v}=-ne\boldsymbol{p}/m=ne^2\tau \boldsymbol{E}/m=ne^2 \tau\boldsymbol{j}/(m\sigma)$
电导率$\sigma=\displaystyle\frac{ne^2 \tau}{m}$

电磁场

稳态下$0=-e\boldsymbol{E}+\boldsymbol{j}\times\boldsymbol{B}/n+m\boldsymbol{j}/(ne\tau)$，
$E=\displaystyle\frac{1}{ne}\boldsymbol{j}\boldsymbol{B}+\frac{m}{ne^2\tau}\boldsymbol{j}=\boldsymbol{\rho}\boldsymbol{j}$，$\boldsymbol{\rho}$为三阶张量
$\rho_{xx}=\rho_{yy}=\rho_{zz}=\frac{m}{ne^2\tau}$，$\rho_{xy}=-\rho_{yx}=\displaystyle\frac{B}{ne}$
霍尔系数$\displaystyle R_H=\frac{\rho_{yx}}{|B|}=-\frac{1}{ne}$

热传导

entry.title: 狄拉克方程
entry.content:
克莱因-高登方程

薛定谔方程

$$i\hbar\partial_t\psi=[ rac{1}{2m}(-i\hbar abla-q oldsymbol{A})^2+qV]\psi$$

动能与机械动量关系

$$E-qV= rac{1}{2m}( oldsymbol{p}-q oldsymbol{A})^2$$

相对论关系

$$(E-qV)^2=p^2c^2+m^2c^4$$

将薛定谔方程移项平方得克莱因-高等方程

$$(i\hbar\partial_t-qV)^2\psi=(-\hbar^2c^2 abla^2+m^2c^4)\psi$$

此方程存在以下缺陷

$1$.$\psi^*\psi$非正定，无法解释为概率密度

$2$.总能量本征值无下限

$3$.为对时间的二阶微分方程，除初始波函数$\psi$外还需$\partial_t\psi$才能确定系统如何演化

$4$.计算氢原子能级与实验偏差较大

$5$.除$V=0$的情况外无法写为$i\hbar\partial_t\psi=H\psi$的形式

虽然克莱因-高等方程具有以上缺陷，但也不能简单否定

$1$.非相对论极限为薛定谔方程

$2$.能导出连续性方程$\partial_t ho+ abla\cdot oldsymbol{j}=0$，其中$ ho=\displaystyle rac{1}{2m}(\psi^*\partial_t\psi-\partial_t\psi^*\psi)$，
$ oldsymbol{j}=-\displaystyle rac{1}{2m}(\psi^* abla\psi- abla\psi^*\psi)$，与经典方程相似

由于克莱因-高等方程符合相对论要求，故猜测错误的并不是方程本身，而是态函数$\psi$，其应该满足更严格的要求

狄拉克方程

相对论要求时空的对等性，由于对时间应为一阶方程，故对空间也应为一阶方程，先考虑$ oldsymbol{A}=0,V=0$的情况，对克莱因-高登方程开方得狄拉克方程

$$[i\hbar\partial_t-c oldsymbol{\alpha}\cdot(-i\hbar abla)- eta mc^2]\psi=0$$

与克莱因-高登方程比较，可知
$$(\alpha^i)^2= eta^2=1\qquad i=1,2,3\
\qquad\
\alpha^i\alpha^j+\alpha^j\alpha^i=0\qquad i eq j\
\qquad\
\alpha^i eta+ eta\alpha^i=0$$

$ oldsymbol{\alpha}$与$ eta$显然不是普通的向量和数，将$ oldsymbol{A},V$纳入得

$$[i\hbar\partial_t-qV-c oldsymbol{\alpha}\cdot(\hat{ oldsymbol{P}}-q oldsymbol{A})- eta mc^2]\psi=0$$

按相对论，取四维矢量$x^\mu=(ct, oldsymbol{x})$，$p^\mu=(E/c, oldsymbol{p})$，$A_\mu=(-V/c, oldsymbol{A})$
定义算符$D_\mu=\displaystyle\partial_\mu- rac{iq}{\hbar}A_\mu$，$\gamma^0= eta$，$\gamma^i= eta\alpha^i\quad i=1,2,3$，
$\gamma^4=\gamma^0\gamma^1\gamma^2\gamma^3=-\alpha^1\alpha^2\alpha^3$

$\gamma$算符满足关系

$$(\gamma^0)^2=1\qquad(\gamma^i)^2=-1\qquad i=1,2,3\
\qquad\
\gamma^\mu\gamma^ u+\gamma^ u\gamma^\mu=0\qquad \mu eq u\
\qquad\
\gamma^\mu\gamma^4+\gamma^4\gamma^\mu=0$$

可得狄拉克方程协变形式

$$(i\hbar\gamma^\mu D_\mu-mc)\psi=0$$

entry.title: 基本群和同伦群
entry.content:
基本群

路径 拓扑空间$M$上的路径为连续映射$\gamma:I\to M$，若$\gamma(0)=x_0$，$\gamma(1)=x_1$，则称$\gamma$为从$x_0$到$x_1$的一条路径，若$x_0=x_1$，则称$\gamma$为基于$x_0$的回路

基本群 拓扑空间$M$的基于$x_0\in M$的基本群$\pi_1(M,x_0)$为基于$x_0$的回路的同伦类的集合，因为基本群独立于$x_0$的选取，故简记为$\pi_1(M)$

定义群乘法，逆以及幺元为$[\gamma_0][\gamma_1]=[\gamma_0\cdot\gamma_1],[\gamma]^{-1}=[\gamma^{-1}],e=[c_{x_0}]$，基本群一般为非阿贝尔群

一般用生成元$S$的自由群$F(S)$和关系$R\subset F(S)$生成的正规子群$\langle\langle R\rangle\rangle$的商$\langle S|R\rangle$来表示基本群

基空间 基空间映射为$f:(M,x_0)\to (N,y_0)$定义为$f:M\to N,f(x_0)=y_0$的连续映射，其诱导出群同态$f_*:\pi_1(M,x_0)\to \pi_1(N,y_0),[\gamma]\mapsto [\gamma\circ f]$

若两个基映射同伦$f_0\simeq f_1$，则其诱导同态相等$(f_0)_*=(f_1)_*$

Theorem 1 若$f:M\to N$为同伦等价，$x_0\in M$，则
$f_*:\pi_1(M,x_0)\to \pi_1(N,f(x_0))$为同构

简单连通 若拓扑空间$M$道路连通且$\pi_1(M,x_0)\cong 1 \;\forall x_0\in M$，则称$M$简单连通

覆盖空间 若有映射$p:\tilde{M}\to M$使得$\forall x\in M$，均存在$x$的开邻域$U$使得$p^{-1}(U)$为$\tilde{M}$中互不相交开集的并，其中每个开集均被$p$同胚映射到$U$，则称
$(\tilde{M},p:\tilde{M}\to M)$为$M$的覆盖空间

若$\tilde{M}$简单连通，则称$p:\tilde{M}\to M$为万有覆盖

van Kampen theorem 若$M=\bigcup_\alpha U_\alpha$，每个$U_\alpha$均为包含基点$x_0$的道路连通开集，且$U_\alpha\bigcap U_\beta$道路连通，则同态$\Phi:*_\alpha\pi(U_\alpha)\to \pi(M)$为满射

若$U_\alpha\bigcap U_\beta\bigcap U_\gamma$道路连通，则$\Phi$的核为所有形如
$\{i_{\alpha\beta}(\omega)i_{\beta\alpha}^{-1}(\omega)|\omega\in \pi_1(U_\alpha\bigcap U_\beta)\}$的元素生成的正规子群$N\triangleleft *_\alpha\pi_1(U_\alpha)$
其诱导出同构$\pi_1(M)\cong *_\alpha\pi_1(U_\alpha)/N$

entry.title: 超导
entry.content:
Attractive interaction and Cooper pairs

库珀对

$$\hat{Z}_{ oldsymbol{k}}^\dagger=\hat{c}_{ oldsymbol{k},\uparrow}^\dagger\hat{c}_{- oldsymbol{k},\downarrow}^\dagger$$

相互作用哈密顿量

$$\hat{H}^{(2)}= rac{1}{2V}\sum_{ oldsymbol{q,k,k’}}\sum_{\sigma,\sigma’}U( oldsymbol{q})\hat{c}_{ oldsymbol{k+q},\sigma}^\dagger\hat{c}_{ oldsymbol{k’-q},\sigma’}^\dagger\hat{c}_{ oldsymbol{k’},\sigma’}\hat{c}_{ oldsymbol{k},\sigma}$$

简化图景$ oldsymbol{k}=- oldsymbol{k’},\sigma=-\sigma’,U( oldsymbol{q})=U<0$，引入$\displaystyle\hat{\Delta}\equiv rac{U}{V}\sum_{ oldsymbol{k}}\hat{Z}_{ oldsymbol{k}}$

$$\hat{H}^{(2)}= rac{U}{2V}\sum_{ oldsymbol{q,k}}\sum_{\sigma}\hat{c}_{ oldsymbol{k+q},\sigma}^\dagger\hat{c}_{ oldsymbol{-k-q},-\sigma}^\dagger\hat{c}_{ oldsymbol{-k},-\sigma}\hat{c}_{ oldsymbol{k},\sigma}\
\qquad\
= rac{U}{V}\left(\sum_{ oldsymbol{k}}\hat{Z}_{ oldsymbol{k}}^\dagger ight)\left(\sum_{ oldsymbol{k}}\hat{Z}_{ oldsymbol{k}} ight)= rac{V}{U}\hat{\Delta}^\dagger\hat{\Delta}$$

Trial wave function

无相互作用费米气体$ ext{NIF}$基态

$$\ket{g}=\prod_{| oldsymbol{k}|<k_F}\hat{c}_{ oldsymbol{k},\uparrow}^\dagger\hat{c}_{- oldsymbol{k},\downarrow}^\dagger\ket{0}
=\prod_{| oldsymbol{k}|<k_F}\hat{Z}_{ oldsymbol{k}}^\dagger\ket{0}$$

引入$\ket{g_ oldsymbol{k}}=(u_ oldsymbol{k}+v_ oldsymbol{k}\hat{Z}_{ oldsymbol{k}}^\dagger)\ket{0}=u_ oldsymbol{k}\ket{0}+v_ oldsymbol{k}\ket{2}$，$u_ oldsymbol{k}^*u_ oldsymbol{k}+v_{ oldsymbol{k}}^*v_{ oldsymbol{k}}=1$，取试探波函数为

$$\ket{g_S}=\prod_{ oldsymbol{k}}\ket{g_ oldsymbol{k}}$$

Nambu boxes

在$\ket{2},\ket{0}$基下有

$$\hat{Z}_{ oldsymbol{k}}^\dagger= egin{pmatrix}
0&1\0&0
\end{pmatrix}\qquad \hat{Z}_{ oldsymbol{k}}= egin{pmatrix}
0&0\1&0
\end{pmatrix}\qquad \hat{n}_ oldsymbol{k}+\hat{n}_ oldsymbol{-k}= egin{pmatrix}
2&0\0&0
\end{pmatrix}$$

Energy

巨正则系综一阶哈密顿量

$$\hat{H}^{(1)}=\sum_{ oldsymbol{k},\sigma}E( oldsymbol{k})\hat{c}_{ oldsymbol{k},\sigma}^\dagger\hat{c}_{ oldsymbol{k},\sigma}-\mu\hat{N}=\sum_{ oldsymbol{k},\sigma}\varepsilon_ oldsymbol{k}\hat{n}_{ oldsymbol{k},\sigma}$$

总动能

$$E_K= ra{g_S}\hat{H}^{(1)}\ket{g_S}=2\sum_{ oldsymbol{k}}\varepsilon_ oldsymbol{k}|v_ oldsymbol{k}|^2$$

引入$\displaystyle\Delta=\langle \hat{\Delta} angle= rac{U}{V}\sum_{ oldsymbol{k}}u_ oldsymbol{k}^*v_ oldsymbol{k}$，由于$\displaystyle \sum_{ oldsymbol{k,k’}}\langle \hat{\Delta}^\dagger\hat{\Delta} angle$贡献主要来自$ oldsymbol{k} eq oldsymbol{k’}$，势能为

$$E_P= rac{V}{U}\langle{\hat{\Delta}^\dagger\hat{\Delta}} angle\approx rac{V}{U}|\Delta|^2\
\qquad\
= rac{U}{V}\left|\sum_{ oldsymbol{k}}u_ oldsymbol{k}^*v_ oldsymbol{k} ight|^2$$

Energy minimization

总能量对$u_ oldsymbol{k},v_ oldsymbol{k}$变分为

$$E=2\sum_{ oldsymbol{k}}\varepsilon_ oldsymbol{k}|v_ oldsymbol{k}|^2+ rac{U}{V}\left|\sum_{ oldsymbol{k}}u_ oldsymbol{k}^*v_ oldsymbol{k} ight|^2\
\qquad\
\delta E=2\varepsilon_ oldsymbol{k}v_ oldsymbol{k}^*\delta v_ oldsymbol{k}+\Delta^*u_ oldsymbol{k}^*\delta v_ oldsymbol{k}+\Delta v_ oldsymbol{k}^*\delta u_ oldsymbol{k}\
\qquad\ equire{enclose}
\overset{u_ oldsymbol{k}^*\delta u_ oldsymbol{k}+v_ oldsymbol{k}^*\delta v_ oldsymbol{k}=0}{=}(-2\varepsilon_ oldsymbol{k}u_ oldsymbol{k}^*-\Delta^*u_ oldsymbol{k}^{*2}/ v_ oldsymbol{k}^*+\Delta v_ oldsymbol{k}^*)\delta u_ oldsymbol{k}\
\qquad\
rac{\delta E}{\delta u_ oldsymbol{k}}=0\Rightarrow 2\varepsilon_ oldsymbol{k}u_ oldsymbol{k}^*v_ oldsymbol{k}\overset{\enclose{downdiagonalstrike}{\Delta^*}}{=}\Delta(|v_ oldsymbol{k}|^2-|u_ oldsymbol{k}|^2)\
\qquad\
4|u_ oldsymbol{k}|^2|v_ oldsymbol{k}|^2= rac{|\Delta|^2}{\varepsilon_ oldsymbol{k}^2+|\Delta|^2}$$

由非超导$\Delta=0$的$ ext{NIF}$基态知此二次方程根中$|v_ oldsymbol{k}|^2$取负号

$$
|u_ oldsymbol{k}|^2,|v_ oldsymbol{k}|^2= rac{1}{2}\left(1\pm rac{\varepsilon_ oldsymbol{k}}{\sqrt{\varepsilon_ oldsymbol{k}^2+|\Delta|^2}} ight)\
\qquad\
u_ oldsymbol{k}^*v_ oldsymbol{k}=- rac{1}{2} rac{\Delta}{\sqrt{\varepsilon_ oldsymbol{k}^2+|\Delta|^2}}\
\qquad\
\Delta= rac{U}{V}\sum_{ oldsymbol{k}}u_ oldsymbol{k}^*v_ oldsymbol{k}= rac{U}{V}\sum_{ oldsymbol{k}}- rac{1}{2} rac{\Delta}{\sqrt{\varepsilon_ oldsymbol{k}^2+|\Delta|^2}}\
\qquad\
= rac{|U|}{2}\int rac{\dd oldsymbol{k}}{(2\pi)^3} rac{\Delta}{\sqrt{\varepsilon_ oldsymbol{k}^2+|\Delta|^2}}= rac{|U|}{2}\int rac{\Delta u(\varepsilon)\dd\varepsilon}{\sqrt{\varepsilon^2+|\Delta|^2}}$$

能量$\varepsilon$对应的态密度$ u(\varepsilon)$与$ ext{NIF}$接近，截止能量$E_{ ext{cut}}>>|\Delta|$

$$ rac{|U|}{2}\int rac{ u(\varepsilon)\dd\varepsilon}{\sqrt{\varepsilon^2+|\Delta|^2}}\approx rac{|U| u(0)}{2}\int_{-E_{ ext{cut}}}^{E_{ ext{cut}}} rac{\dd\varepsilon}{\sqrt{\varepsilon^2+|\Delta|^2}}\
\qquad\
=|U| u(0)\ln{ rac{2E_{ ext{cut}}}{|\Delta|}}=1\
\qquad\
|\Delta|=2E_{ ext{cut}}\exp\left\{- rac{1}{|U| u(0)} ight\}
$$

$$$$

entry.title: 点群和空间群
entry.content:
三维Eulid群$E_3$

旋转反演$\boldsymbol{R}$与平移$T(\boldsymbol{a})$复合操作$\{\boldsymbol{R}|\boldsymbol{a}\}\boldsymbol{r}=\boldsymbol{Rr}+\boldsymbol{a}$构成群$E_3$

平移群$\{\boldsymbol{I}|\boldsymbol{a}\}$为不变子群，旋转群$\{\boldsymbol{R}|\boldsymbol{0}\}$不是

平移旋转一般不对易，$E_3=T\rtimes R$

研究$E_3$分立子群，取定三维晶格，保持晶格不变的操作$\{\boldsymbol{R}|\boldsymbol{a}\}$称为对称操作，满足
$|\boldsymbol{a}|\ge a_0$的对称操作构成的群称为晶格空间群

空间群三类基本操作为平移操作$T=\{\boldsymbol{I}|\boldsymbol{r_n}\}$、点操作$P=\{\boldsymbol{\alpha_s}|\boldsymbol{0}\}$、复合操作
$\{\boldsymbol{\alpha_P}|\boldsymbol{\tau}\}$为旋转反演后进行一个非整数平移

点群中的对称元素和对称算符

$n$度轴$C_n$，其对称元素为$c_n^k$；反射面$\sigma$，与轴垂直为$\sigma_h$，包含轴为$\sigma_v$，平分两轴为
$\sigma_d$；中心反演$i$；$n$度像转轴$S_n=C_n\sigma_h$

夹角为$\varphi$的两个$2$度轴复合，得到与其均垂直的旋转$c_{2A}c_{2B}=c(-2\varphi)$，注意此处定义操作先后顺序为从左到右

夹角为$\varphi$的两个含轴反射面复合，得到沿轴的旋转$\sigma_v\sigma_{v’}=c(-2\varphi)$

第一类点群

第一类点群仅包含纯旋转，以下讨论仅包含晶格点群

单轴点群：$C_1,C_2,C_3,C_4,C_6$

多边形点群：$D_2,D_3,D_4,D_6$

多面体点群：$T,O$

共$11$种

第二类点群

第二类点群包括反演

中心反演：$C_i$

平面反射：$C_s$

旋转与垂直轴反射面复合：$C_{2h},C_{3h},C_{4h},C_{6h}\cong C_n\otimes C_s,C_{2h}\cong C_2\otimes C_i$

旋转与包含轴反射面复合：$C_{2v},C_{3v},C_{4v},C_{6v}\cong D_n$

包含像转轴：$S_4,S_6$

多边形与垂直轴反射面复合：$D_{2h},D_{4h},D_{6h}\cong D_n\otimes C_i,D_{3h}\cong D_n \otimes C_s$

多边形与平分轴反射面复合：$D_{2d},D_{3d}\cong D_3\otimes C_i$

多面体与垂直轴反射面复合：$T_h\cong T\otimes C_i,O_h\cong O\otimes C_i$

多边形与平分轴反射面复合：$T_d\cong O$

共$21$种

第一类晶格点群与第二类晶格点群共$32$种

Bravais格子和空间群

平移群的对称点群$P=\{\alpha:\alpha\boldsymbol{r_n}=\boldsymbol{r_n}’\in T\}$

$P$点群包含反演，且有$C_{nv}$为其子群，一共七种晶系满足此条件

三斜$C_i$，单斜$C_{2h}$，正交$D_{2h}$，四方$D_{4h}$，三角$D_{3d}$，六角$D_{6h}$，立方$O_h$

晶系点群个数Bravais格子数空间群个数
三斜212
单斜3213
正交3459
四方7268
三角5125
六角7127
立方5336
总计3214230

$\qquad\\$

平移群的不可约表示

entry.title: 固体比热
entry.content:
Dulong–Petit

理想固体模型，每个振动自由度能量$\varepsilon^v=\displaystyle\frac{p^2}{2m}+\frac{m\omega^2q^2}{2}$，具有两个正平方项，由能量均分定理，$\overline{\varepsilon^v}=k_BT$，$N$原子固体具有$3N-6\approx 3N$个振动自由度，因此热容为

$$C=3Nk_B$$

Einstein

振动同频假设，一维振子能量本征值$\displaystyle E_n=(n+\frac{1}{2})\hbar\omega$，
配分函数$\displaystyle Z_{1D}=\sum_n e^{-\beta E_n}=1/2\sinh(\beta \hbar\omega/2)$，$Z_{3D}=(Z_{1D})^3$
$\langle E\rangle/N=\displaystyle -\frac{3}{Z_{1D}}\frac{\partial{Z_{1D}}}{\partial{\beta}}=3(n_B(\beta\hbar\omega)+\frac{1}{2})\hbar\omega$，
玻色占有数因子$n_B(x)=1/(e^x-1)$，因此热容为

$$C=\frac{\partial \langle E\rangle}{\partial T}=3Nk_B(\beta\hbar\omega)^2\frac{e^{\beta\hbar\omega}}{(e^{\beta\hbar\omega}-1)^2}$$

爱因斯坦温度$\hbar\omega=k_BT_{\text{Einstein}}$

Debye

周期性边界条件$\displaystyle \boldsymbol{k}=\frac{2\pi(n_1,n_2,n_3)}{L}$，连续化$\displaystyle\sum_\boldsymbol{k}\to \frac{L^3}{(2\pi)^3}\int \dd\boldsymbol{k}$，
各向同性假设$\displaystyle k=\frac{\omega}{v}$，状态数密度$\displaystyle\int_0^{\omega_{d}} g(\omega)\dd\omega=3N$

$$\langle E\rangle=\frac{L^3}{(2\pi)^3}\int 3(n_B(\beta\hbar\omega(\boldsymbol{k}))+\frac{1}{2})\hbar\omega(\boldsymbol{k})\dd\boldsymbol{k}\\
=\displaystyle\int_0^{\omega_{d}} (n_B(\beta\hbar\omega)+\frac{1}{2})\hbar\omega g(\omega)\dd\omega$$

德拜频率$\omega_d^3=6\pi^2nv^3$，状态数密度$g(\omega)=\displaystyle N\frac{9\omega^2}{\omega_d^3}$

$$\langle E\rangle=\frac{9N\hbar}{\omega_d^3}\int_0^{\omega_{d}}\frac{\omega^3\dd\omega}{e^{\beta\hbar\omega}-1}+\small{\text{与T无关常量}}\\
=9N\frac{(k_BT)^4}{(\hbar\omega_d)^3}\int_0^{x_{d}}\frac{x^3\dd x}{e^x-1}+\small{\text{与T无关常量}}$$

低温$x_{d}=\displaystyle\frac{\hbar\omega_{d}}{k_BT}\to \infty$，$\displaystyle\int_0^{x_{d}}\frac{x^3\dd x}{e^x-1}\to 3!\zeta(4)=\frac{\pi^4}{15}$，
德拜温度$\hbar\omega_d=k_BT_{\text{Debye}}$

$$C=3Nk_B\left(\frac{T}{T_{\text{Debye}}}\right)^3\frac{4\pi^4}{5}\propto T^3$$

高温$x_{d}=\displaystyle\frac{\hbar\omega_{d}}{k_BT}\to 0$，$\displaystyle\int_0^{\omega_{d}}\frac{9N\hbar\omega^3\dd \omega}{\omega_d^3(e^{\beta\hbar\omega}-1)}\to =3Nk_BT$，
热容回归Dulong–Petit定律

entry.title: 信息导论
entry.content:
Shannon Theory

接收一串由$a_1,a_2,\cdots,a_k$随机出现，依次排列而成的字符，其中$a_k$出现概率为$p_k$，记此概率分配为$A$，总概率和为$1$，对于足够长的字母个数为$N$的序列，$a_k$出现的次数$\sim p_kN$，对于一个特定序列而言，在所有重排中其出现的次数为

$$\frac{N!}{\displaystyle\prod_k [(p_kN)!]}\overset{\displaystyle N!\sim \sqrt{2\pi N}\left(\frac{N}{e}\right)^N}{\sim} \frac{1}{\displaystyle\prod_k p_k^{p_k N}}\\
\qquad\\
=2^{NS_A}$$

其中$\displaystyle S_A=-\sum_k p_k\log_2{p_k}$为在概率分配$A$下单字符的Shannon Entropy 信息熵

信息熵满足$S_A\ge 0$，当且仅当某个$p_k=1$时等号成立，而由拉格朗日乘数法知所有
$p_k=1/k$时，信息熵取最大值

对于$N$个字母组成的字符串，其可以被压缩为$NS_A$个$\text{bit}$，若所有字母出现频率相等，$S_A=\log_2k$，将$k$进制转换为二进制编码即可做到；若出现频率不相等，则可以通过特殊编码方式，如Huffman编码，适当减少出现频率高的字母的编码长度，增加频率低的字母的编码长度来实现；若字母出现不是完全随机，则可以从中提取出有效信息将体积压缩到更小，如$abab\cdots abab=Nab$

由$a、b$组成的字符串中若存在短程有序序列，则其信息熵降低，可以将这些短程序列合并得到更小的压缩体积，这种情况可以与邻近自旋之间存在相互作用的一维自旋链相类比；对于理想气体近似，忽略短程相互作用，若单个字母的信息熵为$S$，则长度为$N$的字符串的熵即为$NS$，注意这只对$N>>1$的情形近似成立

entry.title: 辛几何
entry.content:
哈密顿方程辛形式

$$ rac{\partial H}{\partial p_i}=\dot{x_i}\qquad rac{\partial H}{\partial x_i}=-\dot{p_i}\
\quad\
x=(p_1,\cdots,p_n,x_1,\cdots,x_n)\
\quad\
abla H=( rac{\partial H}{\partial p_1},\cdots, rac{\partial H}{\partial p_n}, rac{\partial H}{\partial x_1},\cdots, rac{\partial H}{\partial x_n})\
\quad\
J= egin{pmatrix}O&-I_n\I_n&O\end{pmatrix}\
\quad\
J\cdot abla H=\dot{x}\
\qquad\
\{f,g\}=\sum_{k=1}^n[ rac{\partial f}{\partial p_k} rac{\partial g}{\partial x_k}- rac{\partial f}{\partial x_k} rac{\partial g}{\partial p_k}]\
\qquad\
\dot{x}=\{H,x\}
$$

辛流形

$(M,\omega)$，$M$光滑，$\omega\in \Omega^2(M)$非退化，$\dd \omega=0$
由于$\omega$非退化，故辛流形为偶数维，若$M$为$2n$维流形，则$\omega^n$为其上体积形式
若存在$\omega=\dd heta$，则称$ heta$为$ ext{Liouville 1-form}$，称$i(Z)\omega= heta$对应的$Z$为
$ ext{Liouville vector-field}$
若存在伪黎曼度规$g(X,Y)=g(JX,JY)=\omega(JX,Y)$与$h=g-i\omega$，则称$h$为$ ext{pesudo K}\ddot{a} ext{hler-form}$，若$g$正定，则称$h$为$ ext{K}\ddot{a} ext{hler-form}$
$\displaystyle\omega_{\mathbb{R}^{2n}}=\sum_{i=1}^n\dd p_i\wedge \dd x_i$与$\displaystyle\omega_{FS}=i\partial\overline{\partial}\ln\left({\sum_{i=1}^n|z_i|^2} ight)$均为辛形式，后者称为
$ ext{Fubini-Study form}$，$(\mathbb{C}P^n,\omega_{FS})$为$ ext{K}\ddot{a} ext{hler}$流形

辛同胚

若两个辛流形$(M,\omega_M)$，$(N,\omega_N)$之间的微分同胚$\psi:M o N$满足以下条件，则称其为辛同胚
$$\psi^* \omega_N=\omega_M$$
辛同胚存在的必要条件为$\dim M\leq \dim N$
称生成单参辛同胚群$\psi_t$的矢量场$X$为辛矢量场，显然有$L_X\omega=0$
称$Sp(n,\mathbb{R})=\{g\in SL(2n,\mathbb{R})|g^T J g=J\}$为辛群

Moser Stability Theorem
若$(M,\omega_t)$配备了一族辛形式$\omega_t$，$ t\in [0,1]$，则存在一族辛同胚$\varphi_t:M o M$，
$t\in [0,1]$，使得
$$\varphi_0=1\qquad\varphi_t^* \omega_t=\omega_0$$

Darboux’s theorem
若$(M,\omega)$为$2n$维辛流形，则$ orall p\in M$，存在含$p$的坐标卡
$(U,x_1.\cdots,x_n,p_1,\cdots,p_n)$，在$U$上有

$$\omega=\sum_{i=1}^n \dd p_i\wedge\dd x_i$$

局部坐标$(x_1.\cdots,x_n,p_1,\cdots,p_n)$称为达布坐标

拉格朗日子流形

若辛流形$(M,\omega)$的子流形$L\subset M$满足$\omega|_L=0$与$\dim L=\displaystyle rac{1}{2} \dim M$，则称$L$为$(M,\omega)$的拉格朗日子流形

拉格朗日子流形相当于辛几何中的刚体，对其进行微扰则其将不再$ ext{Lagrangian}$

Weinstein’s tubular neighborhood theorem
辛流形$(M,\omega)$的每个拉格朗日子流形$L$均含有辛同胚于余切丛$T^*L$的邻域

哈密顿系统

对辛流形上的任意光滑函数$H\in C^\infty(M)$，由下式定义哈密顿矢量场$X_H$

$$i(X_H)\omega=-\dd H$$

定义泊松括号$\{f,g\}=\omega(X_f,X_g)=-i(X_g)\dd f=-X_g(f)=X_f(g)$

对于配备有正则辛结构$\displaystyle\dd \omega=\sum_{i=1}^n \dd p_i\wedge\dd x_i$的相空间$\mathbb{R}^{2n}$，
$$\displaystyle X_f=\sum_{i=1}^n f_{pi} rac{\partial}{\partial p_i}+\sum_{i=1}^nf_{xi} rac{\partial}{\partial x_i}\
\qquad\
\displaystyle i(X_f)\omega=\sum_{i=1}^n f_{pi}\dd x_i-\sum_{i=1}^nf_{xi}\dd p_i=-\dd f\
\qquad\
\displaystyle f_{pi}=- rac{\partial f}{\partial x_i}\qquad f_{xi}= rac{\partial f}{\partial p_i}\
\qquad\
X_f=\sum_{i=1}^n[ rac{\partial f}{\partial p_i} rac{\partial }{\partial x_i}- rac{\partial f}{\partial x_i} rac{\partial }{\partial p_i}]$$
可见泊松括号定义与经典定义一致，其与李括号关系为$[X_f,X_g]=X_{\{f,g\}}$

$$i([X_f,X_g])\omega=i(L_{X_f}X_g)\omega\
\qquad\
=L_{X_f}i(X_g)\omega-i(X_g)L_{X_f}\omega\
\qquad\
=L_{X_f}i(X_g)\omega-i(X_g)[i(X_f)\dd+\dd i(X_f)]\omega\
\qquad\
=L_{X_f}i(X_g)\omega=[i(X_f)\dd+\dd i(X_f)]i(X_g)\omega\
\qquad\
=d\omega(X_g,X_f)=i(X_{\{f,g\}})\omega$$

在证明中说明了对于哈密顿矢量场有$L_{X_f}\omega=0$，即哈密顿矢量场一定为辛矢量场

泊松括号具有以下性质

斜对称：$\{f,g\}=-\{g,f\}$
雅可比等式：$\{f,\{g,h\}\}+\{g,\{h,f\}\}+\{h,\{f,g\}\}=0$
$$\{f,\{g,h\}\}=X_fX_g(h)=[X_f,X_g]h+X_gX_f(h)\
\quad\
=X_{\{f,g\}}(h)+X_g\{f,h\}\
\qquad\
=-\{h,\{f,g\}\}-\{g,\{h,f\}\}$$
莱布尼茨律：$\{fg,h\}=f\{g,h\}+g\{f,h\}$

Noether’s theorem
令$\psi_t$为$X_H$生成的流，$\varphi_s$为$X_f$生成的流

$$ rac{\dd f(\psi_t(p))}{\dd t}=X_H(f)=\{H,f\}\
\qquad\
rac{\dd H(\varphi_s(p))}{\dd s}=X_f(H)=\{f,H\}\
\qquad\
rac{\dd H(\varphi_s(p))}{\dd s}=- rac{\dd f(\psi_t(p))}{\dd t}$$

$H$在每种变换$\varphi_s$下的不变性都对应着一个守恒量$f$

Arnold-Liouville theorem

配备有$n$个泊松对易$\{I_i,I_j\}=0$的哈密顿量且$ orall x\in M,\displaystyle igwedge_{i=1}^n\dd I_i(x) eq 0$的$2n$维辛流形$(M,\omega)$称为完全可积系统，作映射$\pi=(I_1,\cdots,I_n):M o \mathbb{R}^n$，则$\pi$的非奇点像集的原像中的连通紧集为一个拉格朗日子流形且其微分同胚于$T^n$

Calogero-Moser system

$$H= rac{1}{2}\sum_{i=1}^N p_i^2+\sum_{i<j} rac{g^2}{(x_i-x_j)^2}\
\qquad\
\dot{x_i}=\{H,x_i\}=p_i\qquad \dot{p_i}=\{H,p_i\}=\sum_{j eq i} rac{2g^2}{(x_i-x_j)^3}\
\qquad\
L_{ij}=\left\lbrace egin{array}[l]
&p_i&i=j\
\displaystyle rac{\sqrt{-g^2}}{x_i-x_j}&i eq j
\end{array} ight.\qquad M_{ij}=\left\lbrace egin{array}[l]
&\displaystyle\sum_{k eq i} rac{\sqrt{-g^2}}{(x_i-x_k)^2}&i=j\
\displaystyle rac{-\sqrt{-g^2}}{(x_i-x_j)^2}&i eq j
\end{array} ight.$$

Lax equation

$$ rac{\dd L}{\dd t}=LM-ML$$

考虑包含$ ext{Calogero-Moser system}$在内的更一般的情况，$u,w,y$为偶函数，$v$为奇函数

$$H= rac{1}{2}\sum_{i=1}^N p_i^2+\sum_{i<j}g^2u(x_i-x_j)\
\qquad\
L_{ij}=\left\lbrace egin{array}[l]
&p_i&i=j\
\displaystyle\sqrt{-g^2}v(x_i-x_j)&i eq j
\end{array} ight.\
\qquad\
M_{ij}=\left\lbrace egin{array}[l]
&\displaystyle\sum_{k eq i}\sqrt{-g^2}w(x_i-x_k)&i=j\
\displaystyle-\sqrt{-g^2}y(x_i-x_j)&i eq j
\end{array} ight.$$
利用$\dot{f}=\{H,f\}$
$$\dot{L_{ii}}=-g^2\sum_{k eq i}u’(x_i-x_k)\
\qquad\
\dot{L_{ij}}=\sqrt{-g^2}(p_i-p_j)v’(x_i-x_j)\qquad i eq j\
\qquad\
(LM-ML)_{ii}=2g^2\sum_{k eq i}v(x_i-x_k)y(x_i-x_k)\
\qquad\
(LM-ML)_{ij}=-\sqrt{-g^2}(p_i-p_j)y(x_i-x_j)\
+g^2\sum_{k eq i,j}[v(x_i-x_k)y(x_j-x_k)+v(x_j-x_k)y(x_i-x_k)\
+v(x_i-x_j)(w(x_i-x_k)-w(x_j-x_k))]
$$

若要满足$ ext{Lax equation}$，则需

$$u’(x)=-2v(x)y(x)\
\qquad\
v’(x)=-y(x)\
\qquad\
v(\alpha)y( eta)+v( eta)y(\alpha)+v(\alpha- eta)(w(\alpha)-w( eta))=0
$$

方程可简化为

$$u(x)=v(x)^2+C\
\qquad\
[v(\alpha)v( eta)]’=v(\alpha- eta)(w(\alpha)-w( eta))
$$

考虑具有如下形式的$v(x)$和$w(x)$

$$v(x)= rac{1}{x}+\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}a_{2k+1}x^{2k+1}\qquad w(x)= rac{1}{x^2}+\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}b_{2k}x^{2k}$$

令$ eta=0,\alpha=x$有

$$w(x)= rac{v’’(x)}{2v(x)}+a_1+b_0\
\qquad [v(\alpha)v( eta)]’= rac{1}{2}v(\alpha- eta)( rac{v’’(\alpha)}{v(\alpha)}- rac{v’’( eta)}{v( eta)})$$

以下四种函数均为此方程的解

$$v(x)= rac{1}{x}, rac{a}{\sin(ax)}, rac{a}{\sinh(ax)}, rac{a}{ ext{sn}(ax,k)}$$

可知$ ext{Calogero-Moser system}$满足$ ext{Lax equation}$

守恒量

令$I_k=\Tr\;{L^k}$，由$ ext{Lax equation}$有

$$ rac{\dd I_k}{\dd t}= ext{Tr}(\dot{L}L^{k-1}+L\dot{L}L^{k-2}+\cdots+L^{k-1}\dot{L})\
\qquad\
= ext{Tr}((LM-ML)L^{k-1}+L(LM-ML)L^{k-2}+\cdots+L^{k-1}(LM-ML))\
\qquad\
=\Tr\;(L^kM-ML^k)=0$$

因此$I^k,k=1,\cdots,n$为$ ext{Calogero-Moser system}$的$n$个守恒量

可积性

若$\lambda^k,k=1,\cdots,n$为$L$的$n$个特征值，则$I_k$=$\displaystyle\sum_{i=1}^n \lambda_i^k$，反过来将$\lambda$视为$I$的函数，则知$\lambda$也为守恒量，以下证明$\lambda$两两泊松对易，设$\lambda,\varphi$和$\mu,\psi$分别为$L$的两组特征值和归一化特征矢

$$L_{ij}=\left\lbrace egin{array}[l]
&p_i&i=j\
\displaystyle\sqrt{-g^2}v(x_i-x_j)&i eq j
\end{array} ight.$$
由特征方程有
$$
p_k\varphi_k+\sqrt{-g^2}\sum_{l eq k}v(x_k-x_l)\varphi_l=\lambda\varphi_k\
\qquad\
p_k\psi_k+\sqrt{-g^2}\sum_{l eq k}v(x_k-x_l)\psi_l=\mu\psi_k\
\qquad\
rac{\partial \lambda}{\partial p_k}=\varphi_k\overline{\varphi_k}\
\qquad\
rac{\partial \lambda}{\partial x_k}=\sqrt{-g^2}\sum_{k eq l}v’(x_k-x_l)(\varphi_l\overline{\varphi_k}-\varphi_k\overline{\varphi_l})\
\qquad\
\{\lambda,\mu\}=\sqrt{-g^2}\sum_{k,l=1}^nv’(x_k-x_l)((\psi_l\overline{\psi_k}-\psi_k\overline{\psi_l})\varphi_k\overline{\varphi_k}-(\varphi_l\overline{\varphi_k}-\varphi_k\overline{\varphi_l})\psi_k\overline{\psi_k})$$
记$R_{kl}=\varphi_k\psi_l-\varphi_l\psi_k$，其对$k,l$反称

$$\sqrt{-g^2}\sum_{k eq l}v(x_k-x_l)R_{lk}=(\lambda-\mu)\varphi_k\psi_k\
\qquad\
p_kR_{km}+\sqrt{-g^2}\sum_{k eq l}v(x_k-x_l)R_{lm}=\lambda\varphi_k\psi_m-\mu\psi_k\varphi_m\
\qquad\
\{\lambda,\mu\}=\sqrt{-g^2}\sum_{k,l=1}^nv’(x_k-x_l)(\varphi_k\psi_k\overline{R_{lk}}+\overline{\varphi_k\psi_k}R_{kl})$$

entry.title: 广义相对论导论
entry.content: <link rel="stylesheet" class="aplayer-secondary-style-marker" href="\assets\css\APlayer.min.css"><script src="\assets\js\APlayer.min.js" class="aplayer-secondary-script-marker"></script>

entry.title: 电动力学复习
entry.content:
Drude
$\tau=\frac{m\sigma_c }{n_ee^2}$
$\omega_p^2=\frac{n_ee^2}{\varepsilon_0m}$
$\varepsilon=\varepsilon_0(1-\frac{\omega_p^2}{\omega(\omega+i/\tau)})$
$\mathbf{B}=\frac{\mathbf{k}\times\mathbf{E}}{\omega}$
良导体$GHz$以下，$\varepsilon_r\approx i\frac{\sigma_c}{\varepsilon_0\omega}$，良导体光波段$\varepsilon_r\approx 1-\frac{\omega_p^2}{\omega^2}$，磁能占主
非良导体$\tilde{\varepsilon_r}\approx \varepsilon_r+i\frac{\sigma_c}{\varepsilon_0\omega}$，虚部很小，$\tilde{k}\approx\frac{\omega}{c}(\sqrt{\varepsilon_r}+i\frac{\sigma_c}{2\sqrt{\varepsilon_r}\varepsilon_0\omega})$

entry.title: 量子力学基本方程
entry.content:
薛定谔方程
$$H\psi=i\hbar\frac{\partial \psi}{\partial t}$$
定态薛定谔方程
$$H\psi=E\psi\qquad \psi=\psi e^{-\frac{iEt}{\hbar}}$$
哈密顿算符
$$H=-\frac{\hbar^2}{2m}\nabla^2+V$$
动量算符
$$P=-i\hbar\nabla$$
内积
$$\langle f|g\rangle=\int f^* g\dd\boldsymbol{r}$$
归一化
$$\langle \psi|\psi\rangle=1$$
可观测量
$$\langle f|Qg\rangle=\langle Qf|g\rangle$$
期望
$$\langle Q\rangle=\langle \psi|Q\psi\rangle$$

entry.title: 导体和电介质静电学
entry.content:
静电条件 静电能量 

$$ rac{\partial \small{物理量}}{\partial t}=0\qquad oldsymbol{j}=0\
W= rac{1}{2}\int oldsymbol{D}\cdot oldsymbol{E}\dd V=- rac{1}{2}\int oldsymbol{D}\cdot abla\varphi\dd V\=- rac{1}{2}\int [ abla\cdot(\varphi oldsymbol{D})-\varphi abla\cdot oldsymbol{D}]\dd V\
=- rac{1}{2}\oint \varphi oldsymbol{D}\cdot\dd oldsymbol{S}+ rac{1}{2}\int \varphi ho\dd V\
W_t= rac{1}{2}\int_\infty oldsymbol{D}\cdot oldsymbol{E}\dd V= rac{1}{2}\int \varphi ho\dd V$$

导体条件 汤姆孙定理 

$$
oldsymbol{E}_内= rac{ oldsymbol{j}}{\sigma_c}=0\qquad ho_内= abla\cdot oldsymbol{D}_内=\varepsilon abla\cdot oldsymbol{E}_内=0\
\hat{ oldsymbol{n}} imes oldsymbol{E}_{外表面}=0\qquad\hat{ oldsymbol{n}}\cdot oldsymbol{D}_{外表面}=\sigma\
\varphi|_{边界}=\small{常数}\qquad ormalsize rac{\partial\varphi}{\partial n}|_{边界}=- rac{\sigma}{\varepsilon}\
\delta W_t\overset{电荷分布变动}{=}-\varepsilon\int_\infty abla\varphi\cdot\delta oldsymbol{E}\dd V\
=-\varepsilon\int_\infty[ abla\cdot(\varphi\delta oldsymbol{E})-\varphi abla\cdot\delta oldsymbol{E}]\dd V\
=-\varepsilon\oint_\infty\varphi\delta oldsymbol{E}\cdot\dd oldsymbol{S}+\varepsilon\int\varphi\delta ho\dd V\
=\varepsilon\sum_i\varphi_i\delta Q_i=0$$

导体系能量 电容系数 感应系数 固有能 相互作用能 

$$W_t= rac{1}{2}\int_\infty\varphi ho\dd V= rac{1}{2}\sum_i\varphi_iQ_i\
\varphi_i=C_{ij}^{-1}Q_j\qquad Q_i=C_{ij}\varphi_j\
C_{ij}=C_{ji}\qquad C_{ij}^{-1}=C_{ji}^{-1}\
W= rac{1}{2}\sum_{ij}C_{ij}\varphi_i\varphi_j= rac{1}{2}\sum_{ij}C_{ij}^{-1}Q_iQ_j>0\
\det\mathbb{C}>0\qquad\det\mathbb{C}^{-1}>0\
C_{ii}>0\qquad C_{ij}<0\;(i eq j)\
W_{两体}= rac{\varepsilon}{2}\int E^2\dd V\= rac{\varepsilon}{2}\int E_1^2\dd V+ rac{\varepsilon}{2}\int E_2^2\dd V+\varepsilon\int oldsymbol{E}_1\cdot oldsymbol{E}_2\dd V\
W_1= rac{\varepsilon}{2}\int E_1^2\dd V\qquad W_2= rac{\varepsilon}{2}\int E_2^2\dd V\qquad W_{12}=\varepsilon\int abla\varphi_1\cdot abla\varphi_2\dd V$$

电荷系相互作用能 恩肖定理 

$$W_i= rac{1}{2}\sum_{\alpha}q_\alpha\varphi_\alpha\
abla^2 W_i=0\Rightarrow\small 不能稳定平衡$$

格林互易定理 

$$\int_{\infty-V_{导体}}[ abla\cdot(\varphi abla\varphi’)- abla\cdot(\varphi abla\varphi’)]\dd V=\int_{\infty-V_{导体}}(\varphi abla^2\varphi’-\varphi’ abla^2\varphi)\dd V\
=0=\oint_S(\varphi abla\varphi’-\varphi’ abla\varphi)\cdot\dd oldsymbol{S}\
=\oint_\infty(\varphi abla\varphi’-\varphi’ abla\varphi)\cdot\dd oldsymbol{S}-\sum_i\oint_{S_i}(\varphi_i abla\varphi’_i-\varphi’_i abla\varphi_i)\cdot\dd oldsymbol{S}_i\
=-\sum_i\oint_{S_i}(\varphi_i rac{\partial\varphi_i’}{\partial n}-\varphi’_i rac{\partial\varphi_i}{\partial n})\dd S_i= rac{1}{\varepsilon}\sum_i(\varphi_i Q_i’-\varphi_i’ Q_i)\
\sum_i\varphi_i Q_i’=\sum_i\varphi_i’ Q_i$$

导体表面所受静电力 

$$\dd oldsymbol{F}=-\mathbb{T}\cdot\dd oldsymbol{S}\
rac{\dd oldsymbol{F}}{\dd S}=-\hat{ oldsymbol{n}}\cdot\mathbb{T}= rac{\varepsilon}{2}E^2\hat{ oldsymbol{n}}= rac{1}{2\varepsilon}\sigma^2\hat{ oldsymbol{n}}$$

介质上静电力 

$$\delta W_t\overset{介质位移 oldsymbol{\xi}}{=} rac{1}{2}\delta\int_\infty rac{D^2}{\varepsilon}\dd V\
= rac{1}{2}\int_\infty(2 oldsymbol{E}\cdot\delta oldsymbol{D}-E^2\delta\varepsilon)\dd V\
= rac{1}{2}\int_\infty(-2 abla\cdot(\varphi\delta oldsymbol{D})+2\varphi( abla\cdot\delta oldsymbol{D})-E^2\delta\varepsilon)\dd V\= rac{1}{2}\int_\infty(2\varphi\delta ho-E^2\delta\varepsilon)\dd V\
\int_V\delta ho\dd V=-\oint_S ho oldsymbol{\xi}\cdot\dd oldsymbol{S}=-\int_V abla\cdot( ho\xi)\dd V\
\delta ho=- abla\cdot( ho oldsymbol{\xi})\
\delta W_t= rac{1}{2}\int_\infty[-2\varphi abla\cdot( ho oldsymbol{\xi})+E^2 rac{\dd\varepsilon}{\dd ho_{介质}} abla\cdot( ho_{介质} oldsymbol{\xi})]\dd V\
= rac{1}{2}\int_\infty[2 abla\varphi\cdot( ho oldsymbol{\xi})- abla(E^2 rac{\dd\varepsilon}{\dd ho_{介质}})\cdot( ho_{介质} oldsymbol{\xi})]\dd V\
oldsymbol{f}=- rac{\delta w}{ oldsymbol{\xi}}= ho oldsymbol{E}+ rac{ ho_{介质}}{2} abla(E^2 rac{\dd\varepsilon}{\dd ho_{介质}})\
= ho oldsymbol{E}- rac{1}{2}E^2 rac{\dd\varepsilon}{\dd ho_{介质}} abla ho_{介质}+ rac{1}{2} abla(E^2 rac{\dd\varepsilon}{\dd ho_{介质}} ho_{介质})\
= ho oldsymbol{E}- rac{1}{2}E^2 abla\varepsilon+ rac{1}{2} abla(E^2 rac{\dd\varepsilon}{\dd ho_{介质}} ho_{介质})$$

entry.title: 群论简略
entry.content:
群 子群 中心 生成子群 周期 傍集 
$$\small 集合\overset{乘法封闭、结合律}{\Rightarrow}半群\overset{含幺元}{\Rightarrow}幺半群\overset{含逆元}{\Rightarrow}群\overset{交换律}{\Rightarrow}交换群\\
\small群\overset{另一群子集}{\Rightarrow}子群\\
\small子群\overset{群元与母群元乘法可交换}{\Rightarrow}中心\\
\small集合\overset{包含此集合的所有子群的交}{\Rightarrow}生成的子群\\
\small群元\overset{n次幂等于幺元}{\Rightarrow}n为周期\\
\small子群\overset{与母群群元相乘}{\Rightarrow}傍集\\
$$

entry.title: 静电场边值问题
entry.content:
多极矩 

$$\varphi\overset{点电荷}{=} rac{1}{4\pi\varepsilon_0}\sum_i rac{q_i}{R_i}\
rac{1}{R}= rac{1}{r}+ oldsymbol{r}’\cdot abla’ rac{1}{R}|_{r’=0}+ rac{1}{2} oldsymbol{r}’ oldsymbol{r}’: abla’ abla’ rac{1}{R}|_{r’=0}+\cdots\
= rac{1}{r}- oldsymbol{r}’\cdot abla rac{1}{r}+ rac{1}{2} oldsymbol{r}’ oldsymbol{r}’: abla abla rac{1}{r}+\cdots\
\varphi\overset{r>>r’}{=} rac{1}{4\pi\varepsilon_0}\left[(\sum_i q_i) rac{1}{r}+(-\sum_iq_i oldsymbol{r}_i)\cdot abla rac{1}{r}+( rac{1}{2}\sum_iq_i oldsymbol{r}_i oldsymbol{r}_i): abla abla rac{1}{r} ight]\= rac{1}{4\pi\varepsilon_0}\left[(\sum_i q_i) rac{1}{r}+(\sum_iq_i oldsymbol{r}_i)\cdot rac{ oldsymbol{r}}{r^3}+( rac{1}{2}\sum_iq_i oldsymbol{r}_i oldsymbol{r}_i): rac{3 oldsymbol{rr}-r^2\mathbb{I}}{r^5} ight]\
= rac{1}{4\pi\varepsilon_0}\left[ rac{\sum q_i}{r}+ rac{\sum q_i oldsymbol{r}_i\cdot oldsymbol{r}}{r^3}+ rac{1}{2} rac{\sum q_i[3( oldsymbol{r}_i\cdot oldsymbol{r})^2-r_i^2r^2]}{r^5} ight]$$

entry.title: 电磁场的守恒与对称性
entry.content:
能量密度 能量流密度 动量密度 动量流密度 角动量密度 角动量流密度 

$$\dd W_{机械}= ho\dd V oldsymbol{E}\cdot\dd oldsymbol{l}= oldsymbol{E}\cdot oldsymbol{j}\dd V\dd t\
rac{\dd W_{机械}}{\dd t}=\int_V oldsymbol{E}\cdot oldsymbol{j}\dd V\
oldsymbol{E}\cdot oldsymbol{j}= oldsymbol{E}\cdot( rac{1}{\mu_0} abla imes oldsymbol{B}-\varepsilon_0 rac{\partial oldsymbol{E}}{\partial t})- oldsymbol{B}\cdot( rac{1}{\mu_0} abla imes oldsymbol{E}+ rac{1}{\mu_0} rac{\partial oldsymbol{B}}{\partial t})\
=- abla\cdot( oldsymbol{E} imes oldsymbol{H})- rac{\partial}{\partial t}\left[ rac{1}{2}(\varepsilon_0E^2+ rac{1}{\mu_0}B^2) ight]\
\overset{定义}{=}- abla\cdot oldsymbol{S}_P- rac{\partial w}{\partial t}\
\dd W_{机械}=-\left[\oint_S oldsymbol{S}_P\cdot\dd oldsymbol{S} ight]\dd t-\dd\left[\int_Vw\dd V ight]\
rac{\dd oldsymbol{G}_{机械}}{\dd t}=\int_V oldsymbol{f}\dd V=\int_V( ho oldsymbol{E}+ oldsymbol{j} imes oldsymbol{B})\dd V\
oldsymbol{f}= ho oldsymbol{E}+ oldsymbol{j} imes oldsymbol{B}=\varepsilon_0( abla\cdot oldsymbol{E}) oldsymbol{E}+( rac{1}{\mu_0} abla imes oldsymbol{B}-\varepsilon_0 rac{\partial oldsymbol{E}}{\partial t}) imes oldsymbol{B}\
+ rac{1}{\mu_0}( abla\cdot oldsymbol{B}) oldsymbol{B}+(\varepsilon_0 abla imes oldsymbol{E}+\varepsilon_0 rac{\partial oldsymbol{B}}{\partial t}) imes oldsymbol{E}\
= abla\cdot(\varepsilon_0 oldsymbol{EE}+ rac{1}{\mu_0} oldsymbol{BB})- abla\cdot\left[ rac{1}{2}(\varepsilon_0 E^2+ rac{1}{\mu_0}B^2)\mathbb{I} ight]- rac{\partial}{\partial t} rac{ oldsymbol{S}_P}{c^2}\
\overset{定义}{=}- abla\cdot\mathbb{T}- rac{\partial oldsymbol{g}}{\partial t}\
\dd oldsymbol{G}_{机械}=-\left[\oint_S\mathbb{T}\cdot\dd oldsymbol{S} ight]\dd t-\dd\left[\int_V oldsymbol{g}\dd V ight]\
oldsymbol{G}_{电磁}\overset{单粒子}{=}\int_\infty oldsymbol{g}\dd V’=\varepsilon_0\int_\infty oldsymbol{E} imes( abla imes oldsymbol{A})\dd V’\
=\varepsilon_0\int_\infty[ abla( oldsymbol{E}\cdot oldsymbol{A})- oldsymbol{A} imes( abla imes oldsymbol{E})- oldsymbol{E}\cdot( abla oldsymbol{A})- oldsymbol{A}\cdot( abla oldsymbol{E})]\dd V’\
=\varepsilon_0\int_\infty[ abla( oldsymbol{E}\cdot oldsymbol{A})- abla\cdot( oldsymbol{EA}+ oldsymbol{AE})+( abla\cdot oldsymbol{E}) oldsymbol{A}+( abla\cdot oldsymbol{A}) oldsymbol{E}]\dd V’\
=\varepsilon_0[\int_\infty oldsymbol{E}\cdot oldsymbol{A}\dd oldsymbol{S’}-\int_\infty( oldsymbol{EA}+ oldsymbol{AE})\cdot\dd oldsymbol{S’}+\int_\infty rac{q\delta( oldsymbol{r}- oldsymbol{r’})}{\varepsilon_0} oldsymbol{A}\dd V’]\
=q oldsymbol{A}\
oldsymbol{G}\overset{单粒子}{=}m oldsymbol{v}+q oldsymbol{A}\
rac{\dd oldsymbol{L}_{机械}}{\dd t}=\int_V oldsymbol{r} imes( ho oldsymbol{E}+ oldsymbol{j} imes oldsymbol{B})\dd V\
=-\int_V oldsymbol{r} imes( abla\cdot\mathbb{T}+ rac{\partial oldsymbol{g}}{\partial t})\dd V\
=\int_V\left[ abla\cdot(\mathbb{T} imes oldsymbol{r})- rac{\partial ( oldsymbol{r} imes oldsymbol{g})}{\partial t} ight]\dd V\
\dd oldsymbol{L}_{机械}=\left[\oint_S\mathbb{T} imes oldsymbol{r}\cdot\dd oldsymbol{S} ight]\dd t-\dd\left[\int_V oldsymbol{r} imes oldsymbol{g}\dd V ight]\
\overset{定义}{=}-\left[\oint_S\mathbb{M}\cdot\dd oldsymbol{S} ight]\dd t-\dd\left[\int_V oldsymbol{l}\dd V ight]$$

线性介质中的形式 

$$ oldsymbol{E}\cdot oldsymbol{j}_t= oldsymbol{E}\cdot( rac{1}{\mu_0} abla imes oldsymbol{B}-\varepsilon_0 rac{\partial oldsymbol{E}}{\partial t})- oldsymbol{B}\cdot( rac{1}{\mu_0} abla imes oldsymbol{E}+ rac{1}{\mu_0} rac{\partial oldsymbol{B}}{\partial t})\
=- rac{1}{\mu_0} abla\cdot( oldsymbol{E} imes oldsymbol{B})- rac{\partial}{\partial t}\left[ rac{1}{2}(\varepsilon_0E^2+ rac{1}{\mu_0}B^2) ight]\
oldsymbol{E}\cdot( oldsymbol{j}_p+ oldsymbol{j}_m)= oldsymbol{E}\cdot( rac{\partial oldsymbol{P}}{\partial t}+ abla imes oldsymbol{M})\
=- abla\cdot( oldsymbol{E} imes oldsymbol{M})- rac{\partial}{\partial t}\left[ rac{1}{2}(EP-BM) ight]\
( oldsymbol{E}\cdot oldsymbol{j})_{机械}=- abla\cdot( oldsymbol{E} imes oldsymbol{H})- rac{\partial}{\partial t}\left[ rac{1}{2}(ED+BH) ight]\
w_{e,m}= rac{1}{2}(DE+BH)\qquad oldsymbol{S}_{e,m}= oldsymbol{E} imes oldsymbol{H}\
oldsymbol{f}_t= abla\cdot(\varepsilon_0 oldsymbol{EE}+ rac{1}{\mu_0} oldsymbol{BB})- abla\cdot\left[ rac{1}{2}(\varepsilon_0 E^2+ rac{1}{\mu_0}B^2)\mathbb{I} ight]-\varepsilon_0 rac{\partial( oldsymbol{E} imes oldsymbol{B})}{\partial t}\
ho_p oldsymbol{E}+( oldsymbol{j}_p+ oldsymbol{j}_m) imes oldsymbol{B}=-( abla\cdot oldsymbol{P}) oldsymbol{E}+( rac{\partial oldsymbol{P}}{\partial t}+ abla imes oldsymbol{M}) imes oldsymbol{B}\
+( abla\cdot oldsymbol{B}) oldsymbol{M}-( rac{\partial oldsymbol{B}}{\partial t}+ abla imes oldsymbol{E}) imes oldsymbol{P}\
= abla\cdot( oldsymbol{BM}- oldsymbol{PE})+ abla\cdot\left[ rac{1}{2}(PE-BM)\mathbb{I} ight]- rac{\partial( oldsymbol{P} imes oldsymbol{B})}{\partial t}\
oldsymbol{f}_{机械}= abla\cdot( oldsymbol{DE}+ oldsymbol{BH})- abla\cdot\left[ rac{1}{2}(DE+BH)\mathbb{I} ight]+ rac{\partial( oldsymbol{D} imes oldsymbol{B})}{\partial t}\
\
\mathbb{T}_{e,m}= rac{1}{2}\left(DE+BH ight)\mathbb{I}- oldsymbol{DE}- oldsymbol{BH}\qquad oldsymbol{g}_{e,m}= rac{ oldsymbol{S}_{e,m}}{c^2_{介质}}
$$

entry.title: 麦克斯韦方程组
entry.content:
库仑定律 叠加原理 电场 高斯定理 静电场旋度 电势

$$ oldsymbol{F}_{12}= rac{q_1q_2 oldsymbol{R}_{12}}{4\pi\varepsilon_0 R^3}=- oldsymbol{F}_{21}\
oldsymbol{F}_q= rac{1}{4\pi\varepsilon_0}\int rac{q ho oldsymbol{R}}{R^3}\dd V\
oldsymbol{E}\overset{定义}{=} rac{ oldsymbol{F}_q}{q}= rac{1}{4\pi\varepsilon_0}\int_V rac{ ho oldsymbol{R}}{R^3}\dd V\
\int_V abla\cdot oldsymbol{E}\dd V=\oint_S oldsymbol{E}\cdot\dd oldsymbol{S}= rac{1}{4\pi\varepsilon_0}\int_V\oint_S rac{ ho oldsymbol{R}}{R^3}\cdot\dd oldsymbol{S}\;\dd V= rac{1}{\varepsilon_0}\int_V ho\dd V\
abla\cdot oldsymbol{E}= rac{ ho}{\varepsilon_0}\
oldsymbol{E}( oldsymbol{r})= rac{1}{4\pi\varepsilon_0}\int_{V’} rac{ ho( oldsymbol{r}’)( oldsymbol{ oldsymbol{r}- oldsymbol{r}’})}{| oldsymbol{r}- oldsymbol{r}’|^3}\dd V’\=- abla\left[ rac{1}{4\pi\varepsilon_0}\int_{V’} rac{ ho( oldsymbol{r}’)}{| oldsymbol{r}- oldsymbol{r}’|}\dd V’ ight]
\overset{定义}{=}- abla\varphi\
abla imes oldsymbol{E}=0$$

连续性方程 欧姆定律 安培定律 磁感应强度 静磁场散度 静磁场旋度 磁矢势

$$\int_V abla\cdot oldsymbol{j}\dd V=\oint_S oldsymbol{j}\cdot\dd oldsymbol{S}=- rac{\dd}{\dd t}\int_V ho\dd V\
abla\cdot oldsymbol{j}+ rac{\partial ho}{\partial t}=0\
oldsymbol{j}=\sigma_c oldsymbol{E}\
\dd oldsymbol{F}_{12}= rac{\mu_0}{4\pi} rac{ oldsymbol{j}_1\dd V_1 imes( oldsymbol{j}_2\dd V_2 imes oldsymbol{R}_{12})}{R^3} eq -\dd oldsymbol{F}_{21}\
oldsymbol{F}_{12}= rac{\mu_0 I_1I_2}{4\pi}\oint_{l_1}\oint_{l_2} rac{\dd oldsymbol{l}_1 imes(\dd oldsymbol{l}_2 imes oldsymbol{R}_{12})}{R^3}\
= rac{\mu_0 I_1I_2}{4\pi}\oint_{l_1}\oint_{l_2} rac{\dd oldsymbol{l}_1\cdot oldsymbol{R}_{12}\dd oldsymbol{l}_2-\dd oldsymbol{l}_1\cdot\dd oldsymbol{l}_2 oldsymbol{R}_{12}}{R^3}\
= rac{\mu_0 I_1I_2}{4\pi}\oint_{l_1}\oint_{l_2}\left[\dd oldsymbol{l}_1\cdot abla_{l_2} rac{1}{R}\dd oldsymbol{l}_2- rac{\dd oldsymbol{l}_1\cdot\dd oldsymbol{l}_2 oldsymbol{R}_{12}}{R^3} ight]\
=- rac{\mu_0 I_1I_2}{4\pi}\oint_{l_1}\oint_{l_2} rac{\dd oldsymbol{l}_1\cdot\dd oldsymbol{l}_2 oldsymbol{R}_{12}}{R^3}=- oldsymbol{F}_{21}\
\dd oldsymbol{F}_{ oldsymbol{j}_1\dd V_1}= rac{\mu_0}{4\pi}\int_{V_2} rac{ oldsymbol{j}_1\dd V_1 imes( oldsymbol{j}_2\dd V_2 imes oldsymbol{R}_{12})}{R^3}\
oldsymbol{F}_{ oldsymbol{j}_1\dd V_1}\overset{定义}{=} oldsymbol{j}_1\dd V_1 imes oldsymbol{B}\
oldsymbol{B}= rac{\mu_0}{4\pi}\int_{V} rac{ oldsymbol{j} imes oldsymbol{R}}{R^3}\dd V\
oldsymbol{B}( oldsymbol{r})= rac{\mu_0}{4\pi}\int_{V’} rac{ oldsymbol{j}( oldsymbol{r}’) imes( oldsymbol{r}- oldsymbol{r}’)}{| oldsymbol{r}- oldsymbol{r}’|^3}\dd V’\= abla imes\left[ rac{\mu_0}{4\pi}\int_{V’} rac{ oldsymbol{j}( oldsymbol{r}’)}{| oldsymbol{r}- oldsymbol{r}’|}\dd V’ ight]\overset{定义}{=} abla imes oldsymbol{A}\
abla\cdot oldsymbol{B}=0\
abla imes oldsymbol{B}= abla( abla\cdot oldsymbol{A})- abla^2 oldsymbol{A}\
= abla\left[ rac{\mu_0}{4\pi}\int_{V’} oldsymbol{j}( oldsymbol{r}’) abla\cdot rac{1}{| oldsymbol{r}- oldsymbol{r}’|}\dd V’ ight]+\mu_0 oldsymbol{j}\
=- abla\left[ rac{\mu_0}{4\pi}\int_{V’} oldsymbol{j}( oldsymbol{r}’) abla’\cdot rac{1}{| oldsymbol{r}- oldsymbol{r}’|}\dd V’ ight]+\mu_0 oldsymbol{j}\
=- abla\left[ rac{\mu_0}{4\pi}\int_{V’}\left( abla’\cdot rac{ oldsymbol{j}( oldsymbol{r}’)}{| oldsymbol{r}- oldsymbol{r}’|}- rac{1}{| oldsymbol{r}- oldsymbol{r}’|} abla’\cdot oldsymbol{j}( oldsymbol{r}’) ight) \dd V’ ight]+\mu_0 oldsymbol{j}\
\overset{静磁场}{=}- abla\left[ rac{\mu_0}{4\pi}\oint_{S’} rac{ oldsymbol{j}( oldsymbol{r}’)}{| oldsymbol{r}- oldsymbol{r}’|}\cdot \dd oldsymbol{S}’ ight]+\mu_0 oldsymbol{j}\overset{局域性}{=}\mu_0 oldsymbol{j}$$

洛伦兹公式 法拉第定律 位移电流 真空麦克斯韦方程组

$$ oldsymbol{f}= ho oldsymbol{E}+ oldsymbol{j} imes oldsymbol{B}\
\mathscr{E}_{感应}=\oint_l oldsymbol{E}_{感应}\cdot\dd oldsymbol{l}=-K rac{\dd}{\dd t}\int_S oldsymbol{B}\cdot\dd oldsymbol{S}\
abla imes oldsymbol{E}\overset{静止}{=}-K rac{\partial oldsymbol{B}}{\partial t}\
abla imes ( oldsymbol{E’}-K oldsymbol{v} imes oldsymbol{B})\overset{v}{=}-K rac{\partial oldsymbol{B}}{\partial t}\
oldsymbol{E’}\overset{点电荷}{=} oldsymbol{E}+ oldsymbol{v} imes oldsymbol{B}\qquad K\overset{类比}{=}1\
abla imes oldsymbol{E}=- rac{\partial oldsymbol{B}}{\partial t}\
0= abla\cdot( abla imes oldsymbol{B})= abla\cdot(\mu_0 oldsymbol{j})\overset{矛盾}{=}-\mu_0 rac{\partial ho}{\partial t}=\
\mu_0 rac{\partial ho}{\partial t}= abla\cdot\left[\mu_0\varepsilon_0 rac{\partial oldsymbol{E}}{\partial t} ight]\
abla imes oldsymbol{B}\overset{修正}{=}\mu_0 oldsymbol{j}+\mu_0\varepsilon_0 rac{\partial oldsymbol{E}}{\partial t}\
\left\lbrace egin{array}{l}\displaystyle abla\cdot oldsymbol{E}= rac{ ho}{\varepsilon_0}\\displaystyle abla imes oldsymbol{E}=- rac{\partial oldsymbol{B}}{\partial t}\ abla\cdot oldsymbol{B}=0\\displaystyle abla imes oldsymbol{B}=\mu_0 oldsymbol{j}+\mu_0\varepsilon_0 rac{\partial oldsymbol{E}}{\partial t}\end{array} ight.$$

极化强度 极化电荷 极化电流 磁化强度 磁化电流

$$ oldsymbol{P}\overset{定义}{=} rac{\sum oldsymbol{p}}{\Delta V}\
\int_V ho_{P}\dd V=-\oint_S oldsymbol{P}\cdot\dd oldsymbol{S}=-\int_V abla\cdot oldsymbol{P}\dd V\
ho_{P}=- abla\cdot oldsymbol{P}\
abla\cdot oldsymbol{j}_p=- rac{\partial ho_P}{\partial t}= abla\cdot rac{\partial oldsymbol{P}}{\partial t}\
oldsymbol{j}_P= rac{\partial oldsymbol{P}}{\partial t}\
oldsymbol{M}\overset{定义}{=} rac{\sum oldsymbol{m}}{\Delta V}\
\int_S oldsymbol{j}_m\cdot\dd oldsymbol{S}=\oint_l oldsymbol{M}\cdot\dd oldsymbol{l}=\int_S abla imes oldsymbol{M}\cdot\dd oldsymbol{S}\
oldsymbol{j}_m= abla imes oldsymbol{M}\qquad abla\cdot oldsymbol{j}_m=0\
ho_t= ho+ ho_P= ho- abla\cdot oldsymbol{P}\
oldsymbol{j}_t= oldsymbol{j}+ oldsymbol{j}_P+ oldsymbol{j}_m= oldsymbol{j}+ rac{\partial oldsymbol{P}}{\partial t}+ abla imes oldsymbol{M}
$$

电位移矢量 磁场强度 介质麦克斯韦方程组 弱场各向同性线性响应

$$\left\lbrace egin{array}{l}\displaystyle abla\cdot oldsymbol{E}= rac{ ho- abla\cdot oldsymbol{P}}{\varepsilon_0}\\displaystyle abla imes oldsymbol{E}=- rac{\partial oldsymbol{B}}{\partial t}\ abla\cdot oldsymbol{B}=0\\displaystyle abla imes oldsymbol{B}=\mu_0\left( oldsymbol{j}+ rac{\partial oldsymbol{P}}{\partial t}+ abla imes oldsymbol{M} ight)+\mu_0\varepsilon_0 rac{\partial oldsymbol{E}}{\partial t}\end{array} ight.\
oldsymbol{D}\overset{定义}{=}\varepsilon_0 oldsymbol{E}+ oldsymbol{P}\
oldsymbol{H}\overset{定义}{=} rac{1}{\mu_0} oldsymbol{B}- oldsymbol{M}\
\left\lbrace egin{array}{l}\displaystyle abla\cdot oldsymbol{D}= ho\\displaystyle abla imes oldsymbol{E}=- rac{\partial oldsymbol{B}}{\partial t}\ abla\cdot oldsymbol{B}=0\\displaystyle abla imes oldsymbol{H}= oldsymbol{j}+ rac{\partial oldsymbol{D}}{\partial t}\end{array} ight.\
oldsymbol{P}=\chi\varepsilon oldsymbol{E}\
oldsymbol{D}=\varepsilon oldsymbol{E}=\varepsilon_r\varepsilon_0 oldsymbol{E}=(\chi+1)\varepsilon_0 oldsymbol{E}\
oldsymbol{M}=\kappa oldsymbol{H}\
oldsymbol{B}=\mu oldsymbol{H}=\mu_r\mu_0 oldsymbol{H}=(\kappa+1)\mu_0 oldsymbol{H}
$$

边界条件 真空麦克斯韦方程组完备性

$$\hat{ oldsymbol{n}}_{12}\cdot( oldsymbol{D}_1- oldsymbol{D}_2)=\sigma\
\hat{ oldsymbol{n}}_{12}\cdot( oldsymbol{B}_1- oldsymbol{B}_2)=0\
\hat{ oldsymbol{n}}_{12} imes( oldsymbol{E}_1- oldsymbol{E}_2)=0\
\hat{ oldsymbol{n}}_{12} imes( oldsymbol{H}_1- oldsymbol{H}_2)= oldsymbol{\alpha}\
\hat{ oldsymbol{n}}_{12}\cdot( oldsymbol{j}_1- oldsymbol{j}_2)= rac{\partial\sigma}{\partial t}\
\hat{ oldsymbol{n}}_{12}\cdot( oldsymbol{P}_1- oldsymbol{P}_2)=-\sigma_P\
\hat{ oldsymbol{n}}_{12} imes( oldsymbol{M}_1- oldsymbol{M}_2)= oldsymbol{\alpha}_m\
oldsymbol{E}\overset{定义}{=} oldsymbol{E}’- oldsymbol{E}’’\qquad oldsymbol{B}\overset{定义}{=} oldsymbol{B}’- oldsymbol{B}’’\
oldsymbol{E}( oldsymbol{r},0)=0\qquad oldsymbol{B}( oldsymbol{r},0)=0\
oldsymbol{E}|_S=0\qquad oldsymbol{B}|_S=0\
I\overset{定义}{=} rac{\dd}{\dd t}\int_V(\varepsilon_0E^2+ rac{1}{\mu_0}B^2)\dd V\
=\int_V( rac{2}{\mu_0} oldsymbol{E}\cdot( abla imes oldsymbol{B})- rac{2}{\mu_0} oldsymbol{B}\cdot( abla imes oldsymbol{E}))\dd V\
=- rac{2}{\mu_0}\int_V abla\cdot( oldsymbol{E} imes oldsymbol{B})\dd V\
=- rac{2}{\mu_0}\int_S( oldsymbol{E} imes oldsymbol{B})\cdot\dd oldsymbol{S}=0\
oldsymbol{E}’\equiv oldsymbol{E}’’\qquad oldsymbol{B}’\equiv oldsymbol{B}’’
$$

entry.title: Sturm-Liouville Theory
entry.content:
$\quad\\$

本征值问题

$\quad\\$

二阶实系数常微分方程

$$y’’+a(x)y’+b(x)y+\lambda c(x)y=0$$

乘上系数$\displaystyle e^{\int a(x)\dd x}$化为施图姆-刘维尔型方程

$$\frac{\dd}{\dd x}\left[A(x)\frac{\dd y}{\dd x}\right]+B(x)y+\lambda C(x)y=0$$

对其在区间$[a,b]$上施加齐次边界条件，构成施图姆-刘维尔本征值问题

$\quad\\$

本征值与本征函数性质

$\quad\\$

使得方程有解的实数$\{\lambda_n\}\; n\in \mathbb{N}\;$称为本征值，线性独立的$\{y_n\}$称为其对应的本征函数，对于复的本征函数，易知其共轭也为本征函数，取其共轭与自身相加，总可以得到实的本征函数，其满足如下性质

1.$\{\lambda_n\}$有无穷个元素且离散(可能相等)，在数轴上从左往右数，$\lambda_n$在第多少个点，$y_n$就有多少个零点

2.若$C$为常数，则$\lambda$大于$-B/C$的下界

3.对应于不同本征值的本征函数在$[a,b]$上带权重$C(x)$正交

$$\displaystyle\int _a^b y_m y_n C(x) \dd x=0\qquad m\neq n$$

证：$$\frac{\dd}{\dd x}\left[Ay_m’\right]+By_m+\lambda_m Cy_m=0\quad \unicode{10112}\\
\frac{\dd}{\dd x}\left[Ay_n’\right]+By_n+\lambda_n Cy_n=0\quad \unicode{10113}\\
\int_a^b (\unicode{10112}y_n-\unicode{10113}y_m)\dd x=0\overset{齐次边界条件}{\Rightarrow} (\lambda_m-\lambda_n)\int _a^b y_m y_n C(x) \dd x=0$$

4.本征函数族$\{y_n\}$完备

entry.title: 量子力学基本原理
entry.content:
原理1 描述微观系统状态的为希尔伯特空间中的矢量，相差一复数因子的矢量描述同一状态

原理2 描述微观系统物理量的为希尔伯特空间中的厄米算符，物理量可取的值为算符的本征值，物理量$A$在状态$|\varphi\rangle$中取各值$a_i$的概率，与态矢量$|\varphi\rangle$按$A$的归一化本征矢量${|a_i\rangle}$的展开式中$|a_i\rangle$系数的复平方成正比

原理3 微观系统中每个粒子的位置算符$X_i$与其正则动量算符$P_i$有如下对易关系

$$[X_i,X_j]=0\qquad[P_i,P_j]=0\qquad[X_i,P_j]=i\hbar\delta_{ij}$$

不同粒子的所有算符均相互对易

原理4 微观系统的状态$|\varphi(t)\rangle$随时间变化的规律为薛定谔方程

$$i\hbar\frac{\partial}{\partial t}|\varphi(t)\rangle=H|\varphi(t)\rangle$$

其中$H=H(X,P,t)$为系统的哈密顿算符

原理5 描述全同粒子系统的态矢量，对于任意一对粒子的对调是对称或者反对称的，服从对称的称为玻色子，服从反对称的称为费米子

$$$$

原理2补充：物理量$A$的期望值用$\langle A\rangle$表示，由于厄米算符本征值为实数，对应于不同本征值的本征向量正交，故$\langle A\rangle$在态$|\varphi\rangle=|a_i\rangle c_i,c_i=\langle a_i|\varphi\rangle$中值为

$$\langle A\rangle=\frac{\sum_i|c_i|^2a_i}{\sum_i |c_i|^2}=\frac{\sum_i \langle \varphi|a_i\rangle \langle a_i|\varphi\rangle a_i}{1}\\=\sum_i\langle \varphi|A|a_i\rangle \langle a_i|\varphi\rangle =\langle \varphi|A|\varphi\rangle$$

原理4补充： 当$H$不显含时间时，可将时间分离，令$|\varphi(t)\rangle=|\varphi\rangle f(t)$，代入薛定谔方程得

$$|\varphi\rangle(i\hbar\frac{\partial}{\partial t}f(t))=H|\varphi\rangle f(t)\\
\to H|\varphi\rangle=E|\varphi\rangle \qquad i\hbar\frac{\partial}{\partial t}f(t)=Ef(t)$$

$H|\varphi\rangle=E|\varphi\rangle$称为定态薛定谔方程，若$H$具有离散本征值$E_i$，即$H|i\rangle=E_i|i\rangle$，
则由$\displaystyle i\hbar\frac{\partial}{\partial t}f(t)=Ef(t)$可得特解$\displaystyle f_i(t)=\exp(-\frac{i}{\hbar}E_it)$，故得

$$|\psi\rangle=\sum_i|i\rangle c_i\exp(-\frac{i}{\hbar}E_it)=\sum_i|i\rangle \langle i|\psi_0\rangle\exp(-\frac{i}{\hbar}E_it)$$

entry.title: 量子力学基本概念
entry.content:
斯特恩-盖拉赫实验

斯特恩-盖拉赫实验

$$$$

  银原子核外有$47$个电子，其中$46$个电子可看作形成净角动量为零的球对称的电子云，若忽略与讨论无关的原子核自旋，则原子的整体角动量仅仅来自第$47$个$(5s)$电子的内禀角动量，因此银原子的磁矩即为电子的自旋磁矩$\boldsymbol{\mu}$，其正比于电子的自旋$\boldsymbol{S}$，将银原子流通过沿$z$方向的大小不均匀的磁场$\boldsymbol{B}$，由于磁矩与磁场的相互作用能为$-\boldsymbol{\mu\cdot B}$，故银原子流在$z$方向上受力为

$$F_z=\frac{\partial (\boldsymbol{\mu\cdot B})}{\partial z}=\mu_z\frac{\partial B_z}{\partial z}$$

  可以预期由于$\mu_z$的取值不同，银原子流将在$z$方向上分裂，由于实验所用银原子流为从炉中加热逸出，取向应当完全随机，故$\mu_z$可在$[-|\boldsymbol{\mu}|,|\boldsymbol{\mu}|]$内连续取值，则将在接收屏上观察到沿$z$方向的银带，然而事实是接收屏上仅有一上一下两个银斑，这说明$\mu_z$仅有两个取值

  将上述加上$z$方向磁场的实验仪器称为$SG\hat{z}$仪，为继续探明$\mu_z$的量子化原因，先将银原子流通过一个$SG\hat{z}$仪，如前所述，银原子流分裂为强度大致相等的两束，分别记为$S_{z+}$和$S_{z-}$，现遮去$S_{z-}$，再将$S_{z+}$继续通过下一个$SG\hat{z}$仪，实验结果是$S_{z+}$通过$SG\hat{z}$仪后并不产生分裂，这说明$S_{z+}$通过$SG\hat{z}$仪时继续保持了其原有的$z+$特性

  更进一步，将$S_{z+}$通过施加$x$方向磁场的$SG\hat{x}$仪，银原子流也分为两束，更多的实验表明，无论银原子流之前通过了多少$SG$仪，磁场施加方向如何，将其分流再次通过$SG$仪时其仍然会沿磁场方向分裂为强度相等的两束，经典理论在解释这种量子现象时无疑遇到了困难

  虽然经典理论无法解释，但我们仍可以将此现象与经典情况进行类比，考虑光波的极化现象，若将银原子流视作光束，而$SG$仪看作一个偏振片与将偏振光分为左旋光与右旋光的光学仪器的复合体，则除了光强大小的变化之外，现象均与实验相符合，而左旋光与右旋光的琼斯矢量分别为$\begin{bmatrix}1\\-i\end{bmatrix}$和$\begin{bmatrix}1\\i\end{bmatrix}$，这提示我们或许也应该以复数矢量的形式来描述银原子中的电子的自旋状态

右矢、左矢和算符

右矢、左矢和算符

$$$$

  上节的类比启发我们用复矢量空间来描述电子自旋的量子态，但这种描述方式的合理性终究还是建立在大量的观测和实验检验的基础之上的，故以下仅简略地介绍量子力学的数学语言

  考虑复矢量空间，其维数由所研究的物理系统所决定，一个物理态用复矢量空间中的右矢表示，例如$|\alpha\rangle$；可观测量由算符表示，例如$A$；

entry.title: 电动力学数学基础
entry.content:
$ abla$

  记$ oldsymbol{g_i}$为协变基矢量，$ oldsymbol{g^i}$为逆变基矢量，$\varphi$为标量场，$ oldsymbol{u,v}$为矢量场，$ oldsymbol{T}$为张量场，则梯度、散度、旋度可表示如下如下

$$ abla oldsymbol{T}= oldsymbol{g^i}\partial_i oldsymbol{T}\qquad oldsymbol{T} abla=\partial_i oldsymbol{T} oldsymbol{g^i}\
abla\cdot oldsymbol{T}= oldsymbol{g^i}\cdot\partial_i oldsymbol{T}\qquad oldsymbol{T}\cdot abla=\partial_i oldsymbol{T}\cdot oldsymbol{g^i}\
abla imes oldsymbol{T}= oldsymbol{g^i} imes\partial_i oldsymbol{T}\qquad oldsymbol{T} imes abla=\partial_i oldsymbol{T} imes oldsymbol{g^i}$$

  算子之间常用的等式有

$$ abla(\varphi oldsymbol{T})= abla\varphi oldsymbol{T}+\varphi abla oldsymbol{T}\
abla\cdot(\varphi oldsymbol{T})= abla\varphi\cdot oldsymbol{T}+\varphi abla\cdot oldsymbol{T}\
abla imes(\varphi oldsymbol{T})= abla\varphi imes oldsymbol{T}+\varphi abla imes oldsymbol{T}\
abla( oldsymbol{u}\cdot oldsymbol{v})= abla oldsymbol{u}\cdot oldsymbol{v}+ abla oldsymbol{v}\cdot oldsymbol{u}\
abla( oldsymbol{u}\cdot oldsymbol{v})= oldsymbol{u} imes( abla imes oldsymbol{v})+ oldsymbol{v} imes( abla imes oldsymbol{u})+ oldsymbol{u}\cdot( abla oldsymbol{v})+ oldsymbol{v}\cdot( abla oldsymbol{u})\
abla imes oldsymbol{u} imes oldsymbol{v}=( oldsymbol{u} abla- abla oldsymbol{u})\cdot oldsymbol{v}\
abla imes( oldsymbol{u} imes oldsymbol{v})= oldsymbol{u}( abla\cdot oldsymbol{v})- oldsymbol{v}( abla\cdot oldsymbol{u})- oldsymbol{u}\cdot( abla oldsymbol{v})+ oldsymbol{v}\cdot( abla oldsymbol{u})\
abla imes abla\varphi=0\
abla\cdot( abla imes oldsymbol{u})=0$$

entry.title: 积分变换
entry.content:
$\quad\\$

傅里叶变换

$\quad\\$

无界自由振动

$$u_{tt}-a^2\Delta u=0\\
\quad\\u|_{t=0}=\varphi\qquad u_t|_{t=0}=\psi$$

  进行傅里叶变换$F(\boldsymbol{k},t)=\displaystyle\frac{1}{(2\pi)^n}\int_{\text{total}} f(\boldsymbol{r},t)e^{-i\boldsymbol{k}\cdot\boldsymbol{r}}\dd V$

$$
\quad\\
U’’+k^2a^2U=0\\
\quad\\U|_{t=0}=\Phi(\boldsymbol{k})\qquad U’|_{t=0}=\Psi(\boldsymbol{k})$$

  $U$解具有形式

$$U(\boldsymbol{k},t)=\Phi(\boldsymbol{k})\cos(kat)+\frac{1}{ka}\Psi(\boldsymbol{k})\sin(kat)$$

  进行傅里叶逆变换

  一维情形，得到达朗贝尔公式

$$u(x,t)=\frac{1}{2}[\varphi(x+at)+\varphi(x-at)]+\frac{1}{2a}\int_{x-at}^{x+at}\psi(\xi)\dd\xi$$

  三维情形，得到泊松公式

$$u(\boldsymbol{r},t)=\iiint_{\boldsymbol{k}}\left[\frac{1}{8\pi^3}\iiint_{\boldsymbol{r’}}\varphi(\boldsymbol{r’})e^{-i\boldsymbol{k}\cdot\boldsymbol{r’}}\dd V_{r’}\right]\cos(kat)e^{i\boldsymbol{k}\cdot\boldsymbol{r}}\dd V_k
\\+\iiint_{\boldsymbol{k}}\left[\frac{1}{8\pi^3}\iiint_{\boldsymbol{r’}}\psi(\boldsymbol{r’})e^{-i\boldsymbol{k}\cdot\boldsymbol{r’}}\dd V_{r’}\right]\frac{1}{ka}\sin(kat)e^{i\boldsymbol{k}\cdot\boldsymbol{r}}\dd V_k\\
\quad\\
=\frac{1}{8\pi^3}\iiint_{\boldsymbol{r’}}\varphi(\boldsymbol{r’})\left[\iiint_{\boldsymbol{k}}\cos(kat)e^{i\boldsymbol{k}\cdot\boldsymbol{(r-r’)}}\dd V_{k}\right]\dd V_{r’}
\\+\frac{1}{8\pi^3 a}\iiint_{\boldsymbol{r’}}\psi(\boldsymbol{r’})\left[\iiint_{\boldsymbol{k}}\frac{1}{k}\sin(kat)e^{i\boldsymbol{k}\cdot\boldsymbol{(r-r’)}}\dd V_{k}\right]\dd V_{r’}\\
\quad\\
=\frac{1}{4\pi a}\frac{\partial }{\partial t}\iiint_{\boldsymbol{r’}}\varphi(\boldsymbol{r’})\left[\iiint_{\boldsymbol{k}}\frac{1}{2\pi^2 k}\sin(kat)e^{i\boldsymbol{k}\cdot\boldsymbol{(r-r’)}}\dd V_{k}\right]\dd V_{r’}
\\+\frac{1}{4\pi a}\iiint_{\boldsymbol{r’}}\psi(\boldsymbol{r’})\left[\iiint_{\boldsymbol{k}}\frac{1}{2 \pi^2 k}\sin(kat)e^{i\boldsymbol{k}\cdot\boldsymbol{(r-r’)}}\dd V_{k}\right]\dd V_{r’}\\
\quad\\
\frac{1}{4\pi a}\frac{\partial }{\partial t}\iiint_{\boldsymbol{r’}}\varphi(\boldsymbol{r’})\left(\mathscr{F^{-1}}\left\{\mathscr{F}\left[\frac{1}{r}\delta(r-at)\right]e^{-i\boldsymbol{k}\cdot\boldsymbol{r’}}\right\}\right)\dd V_{r’}
\\+\frac{1}{4\pi a}\iiint_{\boldsymbol{r’}}\psi(\boldsymbol{r’})\left(\mathscr{F^{-1}}\left\{\mathscr{F}\left[\frac{1}{r}\delta(r-at)\right]e^{-i\boldsymbol{k}\cdot\boldsymbol{r’}}\right\}\right)\dd V_{r’}\\$$

$$
u(\boldsymbol{r},t)=\frac{1}{4\pi a}\frac{\partial }{\partial t}\iint_{|\boldsymbol{r}-\boldsymbol{r’}|=at}\frac{\varphi(\boldsymbol{r’})}{at}\dd S’+\frac{1}{4\pi a}\iint_{|\boldsymbol{r}-\boldsymbol{r’}|=at}\frac{\psi(\boldsymbol{r’})}{at}\dd S’$$

entry.title: 相变与临界现象
entry.content:
$\quad\\$

伊辛模型

$\quad\\$

  $N$个自旋处于点阵格点位置，每个自旋只能取$+1$与$-1$两个态，这样的自旋系统称为伊辛模型，为简单起见，仅考虑相邻自旋的相互作用，以$\sum\limits_{\langle ij \rangle}$表示对相邻对求和，系统哈密顿量为

$$H=-J\sum_{\langle ij \rangle}s_is_j-\mu\mathscr{H}\sum_{i=1}^Ns_i$$

  正则系综配分函数

$$Z_N=\sum_{s_1}\sum_{s_2}\cdots\sum_{s_N}e^{-H/kT}=\sum_{\{s_i\}}e^{-H/kT}$$

  如可求得配分函数，则可由自由能求得诸热力学量

$$\quad\\
F=-kT\ln{Z_N}\\
\quad\\
\overline{E}=-T^2\left(\frac{\partial}{\partial T}\left(\frac{F}{T}\right)\right)_{\mathscr{H}}\\
\quad\\
C_{\mathscr{H}}=\left(\frac{\partial \overline{E}}{\partial T}\right)_{\mathscr{H}}=-T\left(\frac{\partial^2 F}{\partial T^2}\right)_{\mathscr{H}}\\
\quad\\
\overline{\mathscr{M}}=\overline{\mu\sum_i{s_i}}=N\mu\overline{s}=-\left(\frac{\partial F}{\partial \mathscr{H}}\right)_{T}$$

$\quad\\$

平均场近似

$\quad\\$

  伊辛模型哈密顿量中有双重指标，较难计算，以下采用平均场近似，设格点配位数为$z$，则

$$H=-\sum_i\mu s_i\left(\mathscr{H}+\frac{J}{\mu}\sum_{\langle ij\rangle}s_j\right)\\
\approx -\sum_i\mu s_i\left(\mathscr{H}+\frac{zJ}{\mu}\overline{s}\right)\\
\quad\\
Z_N=\sum_{\{s_i\}}\exp\left[{\sum_i\mu s_i\left(\mathscr{H}+\frac{zJ}{\mu}\overline{s}\right)/kT}\right]\\
=\sum_{\{s_i\}}\prod_i\exp\left[{\mu s_i\left(\mathscr{H}+\frac{zJ}{\mu}\overline{s}\right)/kT}\right]\\
=\prod_i\sum_{s_i=\pm 1}\exp\left[{\mu s_i\left(\mathscr{H}+\frac{zJ}{\mu}\overline{s}\right)/kT}\right]\\
=\left[2\cosh\left(\frac{\mu\mathscr{H}}{kT}+\frac{zJ}{kT}\overline{s}\right)\right]^N\\
\quad\\
F=-NkT\left[\ln{2}+\ln{\cosh}\left(\frac{\mu\mathscr{H}}{kT}+\frac{zJ}{kT}\overline{s}\right)\right]\\
\quad\\
\overline{\mathscr{M}}=N\mu\overline{s}=N\mu\tanh\left(\frac{\mu\mathscr{H}}{kT}+\frac{zJ}{kT}\overline{s}\right)$$

  由此得到未知量$\overline{s}$的自洽方程

$$\overline{s}=\tanh\left(\frac{\mu\mathscr{H}}{kT}+\frac{zJ}{kT}\overline{s}\right)$$

  令$T_c=\displaystyle\frac{zJ}{k}$，称为临界温度，自洽方程变为$\displaystyle\overline{s}=\tanh\left(\frac{\mu\mathscr{H}}{kT}+\frac{T_c}{T}\overline{s}\right)$

  当外界磁场$\mathscr{H}=0$时，方程化为$\displaystyle\overline{s}=\tanh\left(\frac{T_c}{T}\overline{s}\right)$，$T>T_c$时，方程只有零解，$T<T_c$时，方程对应于自由能极小的解不为零，即产生自发磁化的现象

  观察系统微观哈密顿量，$H_{\{-s_i\}}=H_{\{s_i\}}$，其关于自旋对称，当$T>T_c$时，$\overline{\mathscr{M}}=0$，系统处于顺磁相，宏观状态保持与微观哈密顿量同样的对称性；当$T<T_c$时，$\overline{\mathscr{M}}\neq 0$，系统处于铁磁相，宏观状态发生对称性自发破缺，这是连续相变的普遍特征

  观察序参量$\overline{M}$在$T\to T_c^-$时的变化，此时$\overline{s}\to 0$
$$\displaystyle\tanh\left(\frac{T_c}{T}\overline{s}\right)\approx \frac{T_c}{T}\overline{s}-\frac{1}{3}\left(\frac{T_c}{T}\overline{s}\right)^3\\
\quad\\
\overline{s}\approx \sqrt{3}\left(1-\frac{T}{T_c}\right)^{\frac{1}{2}}\\
\quad\\
\overline{\mathscr{M}}\sim (T_c-T)^{\frac{1}{2}}$$

  序参量$\overline{\mathscr{M}}$以幂律形式趋于零，临界指数为$\displaystyle\frac{1}{2}$

  得到$\overline{s}$与$T$的关系，则可由$F$求得$\overline{E}$及$C_{\mathscr{H}}$的表达式

$$\quad\\
\overline{E}=Nk\tanh\left(\frac{T_c}{T}\overline{s}\right)\left[-T_c\overline{s}+T_cT\frac{\partial \overline{s}}{\partial T}\right]\\
\quad\\
C_{\mathscr{H}}=Nk\left[1-\tanh^2\left(\frac{T_c}{T}\overline{s}\right)\right]\left[\frac{T_c^2}{T^2}\overline{s}^2-2\frac{T_c^2}{T}\overline{s}\frac{\partial \overline{s}}{\partial T}+T_c^2\left(\frac{\partial \overline{s}}{\partial T}\right)^2\right]\\+Nk\tanh\left(\frac{T_c}{T}\overline{s}\right)T_cT\frac{\partial^2\overline{s}}{\partial T^2}
$$

  得到热容在临界点附近的极限为

$$C_{\mathscr{H}}=\left\lbrace\begin{array}{l}0&T\to T_c^+\\\displaystyle\frac{3Nk}{2}&T\to T_c^-\end{array}\right.$$

  在顺磁相$T>T_c$，当外界磁场$\mathscr{H}\neq 0$但很弱时，$\overline{s}\approx 0$，自洽方程变为

$$\quad\\
\overline{s}=\tanh\left(\frac{\mu\mathscr{H}}{kT}+\frac{T_c}{T}\overline{s}\right)\approx \frac{\mu\mathscr{H}}{kT}+\frac{T_c}{T}\overline{s}\\
\quad\\
\overline{s}\approx \frac{\mu}{k}\frac{1}{T-T_c}\mathscr{H}\\
\quad\\
\overline{\mathscr{M}}\sim (T-T_c)^{-1}$$

entry.title: 格林函数
entry.content:
$\quad\$

格林函数

$\quad\$

  泊松方程

$$\Delta u=f( oldsymbol{r})\qquad oldsymbol{r}\in T$$

  格林公式

$$\iint_\Sigma u abla v\cdot\dd oldsymbol{S}=\iiint_T abla\cdot(u abla v)\dd V\=\iiint_T u\Delta v\dd V+\iiint_T abla u\cdot abla v\dd V\
\quad\
\iint_\Sigma v abla u\cdot\dd oldsymbol{S}=\iiint_T abla\cdot(v abla u)\dd V\=\iiint_T v\Delta u\dd V+\iiint_T abla v\cdot abla u\dd V\
\quad\
\iint_\Sigma\left(u rac{\partial v}{\partial n}-v rac{\partial u}{\partial n} ight)\dd S=\iiint_T (u\Delta v-v\Delta u)\dd V$$

  取$v$为单位强度点源产生的势场，即

$$\Delta v( oldsymbol{r}, oldsymbol{r_0})=\delta( oldsymbol{r}- oldsymbol{r_0})$$

  在$T ackslash B( oldsymbol{r_0},\varepsilon o 0)$应用格林公式

$$\iint_{\Sigma-S_\varepsilon}\left(u rac{\partial v}{\partial n}-v rac{\partial u}{\partial n} ight)\dd S=\iiint_{T-B_\varepsilon} (u\Delta v-v\Delta u)\dd V\
\quad\
\iint_{\Sigma}\left(u rac{\partial v}{\partial n}-v rac{\partial u}{\partial n} ight)\dd S-\oint_{S_\varepsilon}\left(u rac{1}{4\pi\varepsilon^2}+ rac{1}{4\pi\varepsilon} rac{\partial u}{\partial n} ight)\varepsilon^2\dd\Omega\=-\iiint_{T-B_\varepsilon}vf\dd V$$

$$u( oldsymbol{r_0})=\iiint_{T}v( oldsymbol{r}, oldsymbol{r_0})f( oldsymbol{r})\dd V-\iint_{\Sigma}\left[v( oldsymbol{r}, oldsymbol{r_0}) rac{\partial u( oldsymbol{r})}{\partial n}-u( oldsymbol{r}) rac{\partial v( oldsymbol{r}, oldsymbol{r_0})}{\partial n} ight]\dd S\quad$$

$\quad\$

  边界条件

$$\left[\alpha rac{\partial u}{\partial n}+ eta u ight]_\Sigma=\varphi(M)$$

  再令$v$满足齐次边界条件

$$\left[\alpha rac{\partial v}{\partial n}+ eta v ight]_\Sigma=0$$

  称$v$为格林函数，记为$G( oldsymbol{r}, oldsymbol{r_0})$

  第一类边界条件$u|_\Sigma=\varphi,G|_\Sigma=0$

$$u( oldsymbol{r_0})=\iiint_{T}G( oldsymbol{r}, oldsymbol{r_0})f( oldsymbol{r})\dd V+\iint_{\Sigma}\varphi( oldsymbol{r}) rac{\partial G( oldsymbol{r}, oldsymbol{r_0})}{\partial n}\dd S\quad$$

  第三类边界条件$\displaystyle\left[\alpha rac{\partial u}{\partial n}+ eta u ight]_\Sigma=\varphi,\left[\alpha rac{\partial G}{\partial n}+ eta G ight]_\Sigma=0$

$$u( oldsymbol{r_0})=\iiint_{T}G( oldsymbol{r}, oldsymbol{r_0})f( oldsymbol{r})\dd V- rac{1}{\alpha}\iint_{\Sigma}G( oldsymbol{r}, oldsymbol{r_0})\varphi( oldsymbol{r})\dd S\quad$$

  第二类边界条件$\displaystyle rac{\partial u}{\partial n}=\varphi, rac{\partial G}{\partial n}=0$

  引入推广的格林函数

$$\Delta G=\delta( oldsymbol{r}- oldsymbol{r_0})- rac{1}{V_T}$$

$$u( oldsymbol{r_0})=\iiint_{T}G( oldsymbol{r}, oldsymbol{r_0})f( oldsymbol{r})\dd V-\iint_{\Sigma}G( oldsymbol{r}, oldsymbol{r_0}) rac{\partial\varphi( oldsymbol{r})}{\partial n}\dd S\quad$$

  下证格林函数具有对称性，以$u=G( oldsymbol{r}, oldsymbol{r_1})$，$v=G( oldsymbol{r}, oldsymbol{r_2})$代入格林公式

$$\iint_{\Sigma-S_{\varepsilon 1}-S_{\varepsilon 2}}\left(u rac{\partial v}{\partial n}-v rac{\partial u}{\partial n} ight)\dd S=\iiint_{T-B_{\varepsilon 1}-B_{\varepsilon 2}} (u\Delta v-v\Delta u)\dd V\
\quad\
\iint_{S_{\varepsilon 1}}\left(u rac{\partial v}{\partial n}-v rac{\partial u}{\partial n} ight)\dd S+\iint_{S_{\varepsilon 2}}\left(u rac{\partial v}{\partial n}-v rac{\partial u}{\partial n} ight)\dd S=0\
\quad\
v( oldsymbol{r_1})=u( oldsymbol{r_2})\Leftrightarrow G( oldsymbol{r_1}, oldsymbol{r_2})=G( oldsymbol{r_2}, oldsymbol{r_1})$$

  三类边界条件下解的积分表达式分别成为

$$u( oldsymbol{r})=\iiint_{T_0}G( oldsymbol{r}, oldsymbol{r_0})f( oldsymbol{r_0})\dd V_0+\iint_{\Sigma_0}\varphi( oldsymbol{r_0}) rac{\partial G( oldsymbol{r}, oldsymbol{r_0})}{\partial n_0}\dd S_0\
\quad\
u( oldsymbol{r})=\iiint_{T_0}G( oldsymbol{r}, oldsymbol{r_0})f( oldsymbol{r_0})\dd V_0-\iint_{\Sigma_0}G( oldsymbol{r}, oldsymbol{r_0}) rac{\partial\varphi( oldsymbol{r_0})}{\partial n_0}\dd S_0\
\quad\
u( oldsymbol{r})=\iiint_{T_0}G( oldsymbol{r}, oldsymbol{r_0})f( oldsymbol{r_0})\dd V_0- rac{1}{\alpha}\iint_{\Sigma_0}G( oldsymbol{r}, oldsymbol{r_0})\varphi( oldsymbol{r_0})\dd S_0\$$

$\quad\$

电像法

$\quad\$

  称无界区域格林函数解为基本解，记为$G_0$，也就是带$-\varepsilon$电量的点电荷产生的电势，一般解$G=G_0+G_1$，二维与三维基本解分别为

$$G_0( oldsymbol{r}, oldsymbol{r_0})=- rac{1}{2\pi}\ln rac{C}{| oldsymbol{r}- oldsymbol{r_0}|}\
\quad\
G_0( oldsymbol{r}, oldsymbol{r_0})=- rac{1}{4\pi} rac{1}{| oldsymbol{r}- oldsymbol{r_0}|}$$

  得到$G_0$后，$G_1$满足拉普拉斯方程$\Delta G_1=0$，可由分离变数等方法求得级数解，当区域边界比较规则时，$G_1$可以等效为点电荷产生的电势，这些点电荷称为产生$G_0$的$ oldsymbol{r_0}$处点电荷的电像，以下列出第一边界条件$u|_\Sigma=f$下几种边界的电像，格林函数以及拉普拉斯方程$\Delta u=0$的积分形式的解

  $r=R$的圆环电像

$$ oldsymbol{r_像}= rac{R^2}{r_0^2} oldsymbol{r_0}\qquad q_像=\varepsilon\
\quad\
G=- rac{1}{2\pi}\ln rac{1}{| oldsymbol{r}- oldsymbol{r_0}|}+ rac{1}{2\pi}\ln rac{\displaystyle rac{R}{r_0}}{\left| oldsymbol{r}-\displaystyle rac{R^2}{r_0^2} oldsymbol{r_0} ight|}\
\quad\
u(r,\varphi)= rac{1}{2\pi}\int_{0}^{2\pi} rac{R^2-r^2}{R^2-2 R r\cos(\varphi-\varphi_0)+r^2}f(Re^{i\varphi_0})\dd\varphi_0=f(re^{i\varphi})$$

  $y=0$的直线电像

$$(x_像,y_像)=(x_0,-y_0)\qquad q_像=\varepsilon\
\quad\
G=- rac{1}{2\pi}\ln rac{1}{| oldsymbol{r}-(x_0,y_0)|}+\ln rac{1}{2\pi} rac{1}{\left| oldsymbol{r}-(x_0,-y_0) ight|}\
\quad\
u(x,y)= rac{1}{\pi}\int_{-\infty}^{\infty} rac{y}{(x-x_0)^2+y^2}f(x_0)\dd x_0$$

  $r=R$的球面电像

$$ oldsymbol{r_像}= rac{R^2}{r_0^2} oldsymbol{r_0}\qquad q_像= rac{R}{r_0}\varepsilon\
\quad\
G=- rac{1}{4\pi} rac{1}{| oldsymbol{r}- oldsymbol{r_0}|}+ rac{R}{r_0} rac{1}{4\pi} rac{1}{\left| oldsymbol{r}-\displaystyle rac{R^2}{r_0^2} oldsymbol{r_0} ight|}\
\quad\
u(r, heta,\varphi)= rac{R}{4\pi}\int_0^\pi\int_0^{2\pi} rac{R^2-r^2}{(R^2-2Rr\cos{\Theta}+r^2)^{ rac{3}{2}}}f( heta_0,\varphi_0)\sin{ heta_0}\dd heta_0\dd\varphi_0\
\quad\
\cos\Theta=\cos heta\cos heta_0+\sin heta\sin heta_0\cos(\varphi-\varphi_0)$$

  $z=0$的平面电像

$$(x_像,y_像,z_像)=(x_0,y_0,-z_0)\qquad q_像=\varepsilon\
\quad\
G=- rac{1}{4\pi} rac{1}{| oldsymbol{r}-(x_0,y_0,z_0)|}+ rac{1}{4\pi} rac{1}{\left| oldsymbol{r}-(x_0,y_0,-z_0) ight|}\
\quad\
u(x,y,z)= rac{1}{2\pi}\int_{-\infty}^\infty\int_{-\infty}^\infty rac{z}{[(x-x_0)^2+(y-y_0)^2+z^2]^{ rac{3}{2}}}f(x_0,y_0)\dd x_0\dd y_0$$

$\quad\$

含时格林函数

$\quad\$

  振动定解问题

$$u_{tt}-a^2\Delta u=f( oldsymbol{r},t)\
\quad\
\left.\left(\alpha rac{\partial u}{\partial n}+ eta u ight) ight|_\Sigma= heta(M,t)\
\quad\
u|_{t=0}=\varphi( oldsymbol{r})\qquad u_t|_{t=0}=\psi( oldsymbol{r})$$

  分解作用力

$$f( oldsymbol{r},t)=\iiint_T\int_t f( oldsymbol{r_0}, au)\delta( oldsymbol{r}- oldsymbol{r_0})\delta(t- au)\dd V_0\dd au$$

  引入格林函数，记$G( oldsymbol{r},t; oldsymbol{r_0},t_0)$为点位脉冲点力引起的振动，要求其满足齐次边界条件

$$G_{tt}-a^2\Delta G=\delta( oldsymbol{r}- oldsymbol{r_0})\delta(t-t_0)\
\quad\
\left.\left(\alpha rac{\partial G}{\partial n}+ eta G ight) ight|_\Sigma=0\
\quad\
G|_{t=0}=0\qquad G_t|_{t=0}=0$$

  下证格林函数具有对称性$G( oldsymbol{r_1},t_1; oldsymbol{r_2},t_2)=G( oldsymbol{r_2},-t_2; oldsymbol{r_1},-t_1)$，
分别记$G( oldsymbol{r},t; oldsymbol{r_1},t_1)=G( oldsymbol{r},-t; oldsymbol{r_2},-t_2)$为$u,v$，由格林公式

$$\iiint_T\int_{-\infty}^{t’}[(u_{tt}-a^2\Delta u)v-(v_{tt}-a^2\Delta v)u]\dd V\dd t\
=\iiint_T(u_tv-v_tu)|_{-\infty}^{t’}\dd V+a^2\int_{-\infty}^{t’}\left[\iint_\Sigma\left(u rac{\partial v}{\partial n}-v rac{\partial u}{\partial n} ight)\dd S ight]\dd t\
\quad\
v( oldsymbol{r_1},t_1)-u( oldsymbol{r_2},t_2)=0$$

entry.title: 二阶常微分方程级数解
entry.content:
$\quad\$

特殊函数

$\quad\$

球函数

  拉普拉斯方程$\Delta u=0$球坐标下表达式为

$$ rac{1}{r^2} rac{\partial }{\partial r}\left(r^2 rac{\partial u}{\partial r} ight)+
rac{1}{r^2\sin{ heta}} rac{\partial }{\partial heta}\left(\sin{ heta} rac{\partial u}{\partial heta} ight)+ rac{1}{r^2\sin^2{ heta}} rac{\partial^2 u}{\partial \varphi^2}=0$$

  分离变量$u(r, heta,\varphi)=R(r)Y( heta,\varphi)$，代入得

$$ rac{1}{R} rac{\dd}{\dd r}\left(r^2 rac{\dd R}{\dd r} ight)=- rac{1}{Y\sin{ heta}} rac{\partial }{\partial heta}\left(\sin{ heta} rac{\partial Y}{\partial heta} ight)- rac{1}{Y\sin^2{ heta}} rac{\partial^2 Y}{\partial \varphi^2}$$

  左右两式变量独立，记其为常数$l(l+1)$，方程化为

$$r^2 rac{\dd ^2 R}{\dd r^2}+2r rac{\dd R}{\dd r}-l(l+1)R=0\Rightarrow R=Ar^l+B rac{1}{r^{l+1}}\
rac{1}{\sin{ heta}} rac{\partial }{\partial heta}\left(\sin{ heta} rac{\partial Y}{\partial heta} ight)+ rac{1}{\sin^2{ heta}} rac{\partial^2 Y}{\partial \varphi^2}+l(l+1)Y=0$$

  第二个方程称为球函数方程，同样分离变量$Y( heta,\varphi)=\Theta( heta)\Phi(\varphi)$，代入得

$$ rac{1}{\Phi} rac{\dd ^2 \Phi}{\dd \varphi^2}=- rac{\sin{ heta}}{\Theta} rac{\dd }{\dd heta}\left(\sin{ heta} rac{\dd \Theta}{\dd heta} ight)-l(l+1)\sin^2{ heta}$$

  左右两式变量独立，记其为常数$-\lambda=-m^2\quad m=0,1,2,\cdots$，方程化为

$$ rac{\dd ^2 \Phi}{\dd \varphi^2}+\lambda \Phi=0\Rightarrow \Phi=A\cos{m\varphi}+B\sin{m\varphi}\
rac{1}{\sin{ heta}} rac{\dd }{\dd heta}\left(\sin{ heta} rac{\dd \Theta}{\dd heta} ight)+\left[l(l+1)- rac{m^2}{\sin^2{ heta}} ight]\Theta=0$$

  令$x=\cos{ heta}$，得到$l$阶连带勒让德方程

$$(1-x^2) rac{\dd ^2\Theta}{\dd x^2}-2x rac{\dd\Theta}{\dd x}+\left[l(l+1)- rac{m^2}{1-x^2} ight]\Theta=0$$

  令$m=0$，得到$l$阶勒让德方程

$$(1-x^2) rac{\dd ^2\Theta}{\dd x^2}-2x rac{\dd\Theta}{\dd x}+l(l+1)\Theta=0$$

  方程$(1-x^2)y’’-2xy’+l(l+1)y=0$为线性二阶常微分方程，$x=0$为其常点，将$y$在其邻域上展为泰勒级数$y=a_0+a_1x+a_2x^2+\cdots$

$1$$x$$x^2$$\cdots$$x^k$$\cdots$
$y’’$$2\cdot 1 a_2$$3\cdot 2a_3$$4\cdot 3a_4$$\cdots$$(k+2)(k+1)a_{k+2}$$\cdots$
$-x^2y’’$$-2\cdot 1 a_2$$\cdots$$-k(k-1)a_k$$\cdots$
$-2xy’$$-2\cdot 1 a_1$$-2\cdot 2 a_2$$\cdots$$-2\cdot k a_k$$\cdots$
$l(l+1)y$$l(l+1)a_0$$l(l+1)a_1$$l(l+1)a_2$$\cdots$$l(l+1)a_k$$\cdots$

$\$

  得到递推式$a_{k+2}=\displaystyle rac{(k-l)(k+l-1)}{(k+2)(k+1)}a_k$，故$y$有一般解
$y=a_0y_0(x)+a_1y_1(x)$，$y_0$和$y_1$收敛半径均为$1$，又$x=\pm 1$时级数必须收敛，故$l$为整数，即$y_0,y_1$之一项数有限，另一个为无穷级数且系数为$0$，得到只含奇次幂或偶次幂的$l$次多项式，将其乘上恰当的常数使得最高次幂项$x^l$的系数为$a_l=\displaystyle rac{(2l)!}{2^l(l!)^2}$，记为$P_l(x)$，称为勒让德多项式，由递推关系得

$$P_l(x)=\sum_{k=0}^{\lfloor rac{l}{2} floor}(-1)^k rac{(2l-2k)!}{2^lk!(l-k)!(l-2k)!}x^{l-2k}$$

  其微分表示称为罗德里格斯公式

$$P_l(x)= rac{1}{2^ll!} rac{\dd ^l}{\dd x^l}(x^2-1)^l$$

  由高阶导数公式可得其积分表示，称为施列夫利积分

$$P_l(x)= rac{1}{2\pi i} rac{1}{2^l}\oint_C rac{(z^2-1)^l}{(z-x)^{l+1}}\dd z$$

  将$x$换回$\cos{ heta}$，令$z=\cos{ heta}+i\sin{ heta}e^{i\psi}$得拉普拉斯积分

$$P_l(x)= rac{1}{\pi}\int_0^\pi(\cos{ heta}+i\sin{ heta}\cos{\psi})^l\dd\psi$$

  作为施图姆-刘维尔本征值问题的正交关系的特例，不同阶的勒让德多项式在区间$(-1,+1)$上正交，即

$$\int_{-1}^{+1}P_k(x)P_l(x)\dd x=0\qquad k eq l$$

  记勒让德多项式的模为$N_l$，则

$$N_l^2=\int_{-1}^{+1}P_l(x)^2\dd x\
= rac{1}{2^{2l}(l!)^2}\int_{-1}^{+1}\left[ rac{\dd ^l}{\dd x^l}(x^2-1)^l ight]\left[ rac{\dd ^l}{\dd x^l}(x^2-1)^l ight]\dd x\
= rac{-1}{2^{2l}(l!)^2}\int_{-1}^{+1}\left[ rac{\dd ^{l-1}}{\dd x^{l-1}}(x^2-1)^l ight]\left[ rac{\dd ^{l+1}}{\dd x^{l+1}}(x^2-1)^l ight]\dd x\
= rac{(-1)^l}{2^{2l}(l!)^2}\int_{-1}^{+1}\left[ rac{\dd ^{0}}{\dd x^{0}}(x^2-1)^l ight]\left[ rac{\dd ^{2l}}{\dd x^{2l}}(x^2-1)^l ight]\dd x\
= rac{(-1)^l(2l)!}{2^{2l}(l!)^2}\int_{-1}^{+1}(x^2-1)^l\dd x= rac{2}{2l+1}\
N_l=\displaystyle\sqrt{ rac{2}{2l+1}}$$

  作为施图姆-刘维尔本征值问题的特例，$P_l(x)$是完备的，因此可作为广义傅里叶级数展开的基，即若$f(x)$为定义在$[-1,1]$上的函数，或$f( heta)$为定义在$[0,\pi]$上的函数，则有

$$\left\lbrace egin{array}{l}\displaystyle f(x)=\sum_{l=0}^\infty f_lP_l(x)\\displaystyle f_l= rac{2l+1}{2}\int_{-1}^{1}f(x)P_l(x)\dd x\end{array} ight.$$

  在单位球北极放置$4\pi\varepsilon_0$的正电荷，则在球内的静电势为

$$u= rac{1}{\sqrt{1-2r\cos{ heta}+r^2}}$$

  $u$遵循拉普拉斯方程，且关于极轴对称，故解具有形式

$$u=\sum_{l=0}^\infty\left(A_lr^l+B_l rac{1}{r^{l+1}} ight)P_l(\cos{ heta})$$

  利用$P_l(1)=1$可得

$$ rac{1}{\sqrt{1-2r\cos{ heta}+r^2}}=\left\lbrace egin{array}{l}\displaystyle\sum_{l=0}^\infty r^lP_l(\cos{ heta})\qquad r<1\\displaystyle\sum_{l=0}^\infty rac{1}{r^{l+1}}P_l(\cos{ heta})\qquad r>1\end{array} ight.$$

  故称$\displaystyle rac{1}{\sqrt{1-2r\cos{ heta}+r^2}}$为勒让德多项式的母函数，令球半径为$R$则有

$$ rac{1}{\sqrt{R^2-2Rr\cos{ heta}+r^2}}=\left\lbrace egin{array}{l}\displaystyle\sum_{l=0}^\infty rac{r^l}{R^{l+1}}P_l(\cos{ heta})\qquad r<1\\displaystyle\sum_{l=0}^\infty rac{R^l}{r^{l+1}}P_l(\cos{ heta})\qquad r>1\end{array} ight.$$

  由$\displaystyle rac{1}{\sqrt{1-2rx+r^2}}=\sum_{l=0}^\infty r^lP_l(x)$对$r$求导得

$$ rac{x-r}{(1-2rx+r^2)^ rac{3}{2}}=\sum_{l=0}^\infty lr^{l-1}P_l(x)$$

  即$\displaystyle\sum_{l=0}^\infty \left[(l+1)r^2-(2l+1)xr+l ight]r^{l-1}P_l(x)=0$，可得递推式

$$(l+1)P_{l+1}(x)-(2l+1)xP_l(x)+lP_{l-1}(x)=0$$

  若$m eq 0$，得到连带勒让德方程

$$(1-x^2) rac{\dd ^2\Theta}{\dd x^2}-2x rac{\dd\Theta}{\dd x}+\left[l(l+1)- rac{m^2}{1-x^2} ight]\Theta=0$$

  作变换$\Theta=(1-x^2)^{ rac{m}{2}}y(x)$，方程化为

$$(1-x^2)y’’-2(m+1)xy’+\left[l(l+1)-m(m+1) ight]y=0$$

  将勒让德方程$(1-x^2)y’’-2xy’+l(l+1)y=0$对$x$求导$m$次得

$$(1-x^2)y^{(m+2)}-2(m+1)xy^{(m+1)}+\left[l(l+1)-m(m+1) ight]y^{(m)}=0$$

  可知连带勒让德方程的解为$P_l(x)^{(m)}$，即$\Theta=(1-x^2)^{ rac{m}{2}}P_l(x)^{(m)}$，称为连带勒让德函数，记作$P_l^m(x)$

  相应的罗德里格斯公式为

$$P_l^m(x)= rac{(1-x^2)^{ rac{m}{2}}}{2^ll!} rac{\dd ^{l+m}}{\dd x^{l+m}}(x^2-1)^{l}$$

  由于连带勒让德方程中仅出现$m^2$，并不排除$m$为负的可能性，故可设想如下函数亦为方程的解

$$P_l^{-m}(x)= rac{(1-x^2)^{- rac{m}{2}}}{2^ll!} rac{\dd ^{l-m}}{\dd x^{l-m}}(x^2-1)^{l}$$

  验证可得$P_l^m(x)$为$P_l^{-m}(x)$倍数，即

$$ rac{P_l^m(x)}{P_l^{-m}(x)}=(-1)^m rac{(l+m)!}{(l-m)!}$$

  相应的施列夫利积分为

$$P_l^m(x)= rac{(1-x^2)^{ rac{m}{2}}}{2^l} rac{1}{2\pi i} rac{(l+m)!}{l!}\oint_{C} rac{(z^2-1)^l}{(z-x)^{l+m+1}}\dd z$$

  相应的拉普拉斯积分为

$$P_l^m(x)= rac{i^m}{2\pi} rac{(l+m)!}{l!}\int_{-\pi}^\pi e^{-im\psi}(\cos{ heta}+i\sin{ heta}\cos{\psi})^l\dd\psi$$

  作为施图姆-刘维尔本征值问题的正交关系的特例，不同阶的连带勒让德函数在区间$(-1,+1)$上正交，即

$$\int_{-1}^{+1}P_k^m(x)P_l^m(x)\dd x=0\qquad k eq l$$

  记连带勒让德多项式的模为$N_l^m$，则

$$(N_l^m)^2=\int_{-1}^{1}P_l^m(x)^2\dd x\
=(-1)^m rac{(l+m)!}{(l-m)!}\int_{-1}^{1}P_l^{-m}(x)P_l^{m}(x)\dd x\
=(-1)^m rac{(l+m)!}{(l-m)!} rac{1}{2^{2l}(l!)^2}\int_{-1}^{1}\left[ rac{\dd ^{l-m}}{\dd x^{l-m}}(x^2-1)^l ight]\left[ rac{\dd ^{l+m}}{\dd x^{l+m}}(x^2-1)^l ight]\dd x\
=(-1)^l rac{(l+m)!}{(l-m)!} rac{1}{2^{2l}(l!)^2}\int_{-1}^{1}\left[ rac{\dd ^{0}}{\dd x^{0}}(x^2-1)^l ight]\left[ rac{\dd ^{2l}}{\dd x^{2l}}(x^2-1)^l ight]\dd x\
=(-1)^l rac{(l+m)!}{(l-m)!} rac{(2l)!}{2^{2l}(l!)^2}\int_{-1}^{1}(x^2-1)^{2l}\dd x\
= rac{(l+m)!}{(l-m)!} rac{2}{2l+1}\
N_l^m=\sqrt{ rac{(l+m)!}{(l-m)!} rac{2}{2l+1}}$$

  作为施图姆-刘维尔本征值问题的特例，$P_l^m(x)$是完备的，因此可作为广义傅里叶级数展开的基，即若$f(x)$为定义在$[-1,1]$上的函数，或$f( heta)$为定义在$[0,\pi]$上的函数，则有

$$\left\lbrace egin{array}{l}\displaystyle f(x)=\sum_{l=0}^\infty f_lP_l^m(x)\\displaystyle f_l= rac{(l-m)!}{(l+m)!} rac{2l+1}{2}\int_{-1}^{1}f(x)P_l^m(x)\dd x\end{array} ight.$$

  至此得到球函数方程的解，习惯上表示为如下两种形式

$$Y_l^m( heta,\varphi)=P_l^{|m|}(\cos{ heta})\left\lbrace egin{array}{l}\sin{m\varphi}\
\cos{m\varphi}\end{array} ight brace\
Y_l^m( heta,\varphi)=P_l^{|m|}(\cos{ heta})e^{im\varphi}$$

  作为连带勒让德函数与指数函数的乘积，$Y_l^m( heta,\varphi)$在球面上正交，即

$$\iint_SY_l^m( heta,\varphi)Y_k^n( heta,\varphi)\sin{ heta}\dd heta\dd\varphi=0\qquad(m eq n\;\small{或}\;l eq k)$$

  实数形式与复数形式的球函数的模分别为

$$N_l^m=\sqrt{ rac{2\pi (1+\delta_0^m)}{2l+1} rac{(l+m)!}{(l-m)!}}\
N_l^m=\sqrt{ rac{4\pi}{2l+1} rac{(l+m)!}{(l-m)!}}$$

  以球函数为基的实数形式和复数形式的傅里叶展开为

$$\left\lbrace egin{array}{l}\displaystyle f( heta,\varphi)=\sum_{m=0}^\infty\sum_{l=m}^\infty \left[A_l^m\cos{m\varphi}+B_l^m\sin{m\varphi} ight]P_l^m(\cos{ heta})\\displaystyle A_l^m= rac{(l-m)!}{(l+m)!} rac{2l+1}{2\pi(1+\delta_0^m)}\int_{0}^{\pi}\int_{0}^{2\pi}f( heta,\varphi)P_l^m(\cos{ heta})\cos{m\varphi}\sin{ heta}\dd heta\dd\varphi\\displaystyle B_l^m= rac{(l-m)!}{(l+m)!} rac{2l+1}{2\pi}\int_{0}^{\pi}\int_{0}^{2\pi}f( heta,\varphi)P_l^m(\cos{ heta})\sin{m\varphi}\sin{ heta}\dd heta\dd\varphi\end{array} ight.\
\quad\
\left\lbrace egin{array}{l}\displaystyle f( heta,\varphi)=\sum_{l=0}^\infty\sum_{m=-l}^{m=l} C_l^mP_l^{|m|}(\cos{ heta})e^{im\varphi}\\displaystyle C_l^m= rac{(l-|m|)!}{(l+|m|)!} rac{2l+1}{4\pi}\int_{0}^{\pi}\int_{0}^{2\pi}f( heta,\varphi)P_l^{|m|}(\cos{ heta})e^{-im\varphi}\sin{ heta}\dd heta\dd\varphi\end{array} ight.$$

  使用正交归一球函数

$$Y_{lm}( heta,\varphi)= rac{Y_l^m( heta,\varphi)}{N_l^m}=\sqrt{ rac{2l+1}{4\pi} rac{(l-|m|)!}{(l+|m|)!}}P_l^{|m|}(\cos{ heta})e^{im\varphi}\
\left\lbrace egin{array}{l}\displaystyle f( heta,\varphi)=\sum_{l=0}^\infty\sum_{m=-l}^{m=l} C_l^mY_{lm}( heta,\varphi)\\displaystyle C_l^m=\int_{0}^{\pi}\int_{0}^{2\pi}f( heta,\varphi)Y_{lm}^{*}( heta,\varphi)\sin{ heta}\dd heta\dd\varphi\end{array} ight.$$

$$\quad\$$

柱函数

  拉普拉斯方程$\Delta u=0$柱坐标下表达式为

$$ rac{1}{r^2} rac{\partial }{\partial r}\left(r^2 rac{\partial u}{\partial r} ight)+ rac{1}{r^2} rac{\partial^2 u}{\partial \varphi^2}+ rac{\partial^2 u}{\partial z^2}=0$$

  分离变量$u(r, heta,\varphi)=R(r)\Phi(\varphi)Z(z)$，代入得

$$ rac{1}{R} rac{\dd}{\dd r}\left(r^2 rac{\dd R}{\dd r} ight)+ rac{r^2}{Z} rac{\dd^2 Z}{\dd z^2}=- rac{1}{\Phi} rac{\dd^2 \Phi}{\dd \varphi^2}$$

  左右两式变量独立，记其为常数$\lambda=m^2\quad m=1,2,\cdots$，方程化为

$$ rac{\dd ^2 \Phi}{\dd \varphi^2}+\lambda \Phi=0\Rightarrow \Phi=A\cos{m\varphi}+B\sin{m\varphi}\
rac{1}{R} rac{\dd^2 R}{\dd r^2}+ rac{2}{Rr} rac{\dd R}{\dd r}- rac{m^2}{r^2}=- rac{1}{Z} rac{\dd^2 Z}{\dd z^2}$$

  左右两式变量独立，记其为常数$-\mu$

  $\mu=0$，方程解为

$$Z(z)=Az+B\R(r)=\left\lbrace egin{array}{l}\displaystyle C+D\ln{r}\qquad m=0\
\displaystyle Cr^m+ rac{D}{r^m}\qquad m=1,2,\cdots\end{array} ight.$$

  $\mu>0$，作代换$x=\sqrt{\mu}r$，方程化为

$$Z(z)=Ae^{\sqrt{\mu}z}+Be^{-\sqrt{\mu}z}\
x^2 rac{\dd^2 R}{\dd x^2}+x rac{\dd R}{\dd x}+(x^2-m^2)R=0$$

  第二个方程称为$m$阶贝塞尔方程

  $\mu<0$，作代换$x=\sqrt{-\mu}r$，方程化为

$$Z(z)=A\cos{\sqrt{-\mu}z}+B\sin{\sqrt{-\mu}z}\
x^2 rac{\dd^2 R}{\dd x^2}+x rac{\dd R}{\dd x}-(x^2+m^2)R=0$$

  第二个方程称为$m$阶虚宗量贝塞尔方程

  方程$x^2y’’+xy’+(x^2- u^2)y=0$为线性二阶常微分方程，$x=0$为其正则奇点，其判定方程为

$$s(s-1)+s- u^2=0$$

  其两根为$s_1= u,s_2=- u$

  $s_1-s_2=2 u eq$正整数和零时，方程两个线性独立解具有形式

$$y_1(x)=\sum_{k=0}^\infty a_kx^{s_1+k}\
y_2(x)=\sum_{k=0}^\infty b_kx^{s_2+k}$$

  先不分$s_1,s_2$，记为$s$，将$y$在$x=0$邻域上展为洛朗级数
$y=a_0x^s+a_1x^{s+1}+a_2x^{s+2}+\cdots$

$x^s$$x^{s+1}$$x^{s+2}$$\cdots$$x^{s+k}$$\cdots$
$x^2y’’$$s(s-1)a_0$$(s+1)sa_1$$(s+2)(s+1)a_2$$\cdots$$(s+k)(s+k-1)a_{k}$$\cdots$
$xy’$$sa_0$$(s+1)a_1$$(s+2)a_2$$\cdots$$(s+k)a_k$$\cdots$
$x^2y$$a_0$$\cdots$$a_{k-2}$$\cdots$
$- u^2y$$- u^2a_0$$- u^2a_1$$- u^2a_2$$\cdots$$- u^2a_k$$\cdots$

$\$

  得到递推式$[(s+k)^2- u^2]a_k+a_{k-2}=0$，其收敛半径为$\infty$，取$s= u$，由递推式得

$$a_{2k}= rac{(-1)^k}{2^{2k}} rac{1}{k!( u+1)( u+2)\cdots( u+k)}a_0\
\quad\
a_{2k+1}=0$$

  通常取$a_0=\displaystyle rac{1}{2^ u\Gamma( u+1)}$，得到贝塞尔方程一个特解，称为$ u$阶贝塞尔函数

$$J_ u(x)=\sum_{k=0}^\infty(-1)^k rac{1}{k!\Gamma( u+k+1)}\left( rac{x}{2} ight)^{ u+2k}$$

  取$s=- u$，由递推式得

$$b_{2k}= rac{(-1)^k}{2^{2k}} rac{1}{k!(- u+1)(- u+2)\cdots(- u+k)}b_0\
\quad\
b_{2k+1}=0$$

  通常取$b_0=\displaystyle rac{1}{2^{- u}\Gamma( u+1)}$，得到贝塞尔方程一个特解，称为$- u$阶贝塞尔函数

$$J_{- u}(x)=\sum_{k=0}^\infty(-1)^k rac{1}{k!\Gamma(- u+k+1)}\left( rac{x}{2} ight)^{- u+2k}$$

  故$ u$阶贝塞尔方程通解为$y(x)=C_1J_ u(x)+C_2J_{- u}(x)$，取
$C_1=\cot{ u\pi},C_2=-\csc{ u\pi}$，得到$ u$阶诺伊曼函数

$$N_ u(x)= rac{J_ u(x)\cos{ u\pi}-J_{- u}(x)}{\sin{ u\pi}}$$

  $s_1-s_2=2 u=2l+1\qquad l=0,1,2\cdots\quad$时，$ u$阶贝塞尔方程成为
$x^2y’’+xy’+\left[x^2-\left(l+\displaystyle rac{1}{2} ight)^2 ight]y=0$

  首先考虑$l=0$的$\displaystyle rac{1}{2}$阶贝塞尔方程，判定方程两根为$s_1=\displaystyle rac{1}{2},s_2=- rac{1}{2}$，由前知方程对应于较大根$s_1$的特解为

$$y_1(x)=J_{ rac{1}{2}}(x)=\sum_{k=0}^\infty(-1)^k rac{1}{k!\Gamma(k+\displaystyle rac{3}{2})}\left( rac{x}{2} ight)^{ rac{1}{2}+2k}\
=\sqrt{ rac{2}{\pi x}}\sum_{k=0}^\infty(-1)^k rac{1}{(2k+1)!}x^{2k+1}\
=\sqrt{ rac{2}{\pi x}}\sin{x}$$

  第二个特解具有形式

$$y_2(x)=AJ_{ rac{1}{2}}(x)\ln{x}+\sum_{k=- rac{1}{2}}^\infty b_kx^k$$

  代入$\displaystyle rac{1}{2}$阶贝塞尔方程得

$$2AxJ_{ rac{1}{2}}’(x)+\sum_{k=- rac{1}{2}}^\infty\left(k^2- rac{1}{4} ight)b_kx^k+\sum_{k=- rac{1}{2}}^\infty b_kx^{k+2}=0$$

$x^{- rac{1}{2}}$$x^{ rac{1}{2}}$$x^{ rac{3}{2}}$$x^{ rac{5}{2}}$$\cdots$$x^{k+2}$$\cdots$
$2AxJ_{ rac{1}{2}}’$$\displaystyle A\sqrt{ rac{2}{\pi}}$$\displaystyle -A\sqrt{ rac{2}{\pi}} rac{5}{3!}$$\cdots$$\displaystyle(-1)^{ rac{2k+3}{4}}A\sqrt{ rac{2}{\pi}} rac{2(k+2)}{(k+\displaystyle rac{5}{2})!}\k=2m+\displaystyle rac{1}{2}$$\cdots$
$\displaystyle\sum\limits_{k=- rac{1}{2}}^\infty\left(k^2- rac{1}{4} ight)b_kx^k$$\displaystyle \left[\left( rac{3}{2} ight)^2- rac{1}{4} ight]b_{ rac{3}{2}}$$\displaystyle\left[\left( rac{5}{2} ight)^2- rac{1}{4} ight]b_{ rac{5}{2}}$$\cdots$$\displaystyle\left[\left(k+2 ight)^2- rac{1}{4} ight]b_{k+2}$$\cdots$
$\displaystyle\sum_{k=- rac{1}{2}}^\infty b_kx^{k+2}$$b_{- rac{1}{2}}$$b_{ rac{1}{2}}$$\cdots$$b_{k}$$\cdots$

$\$

  由表可知$A=0$，则有递推式$\displaystyle \left(k^2- rac{1}{4} ight)b_k+b_{k-2}=0$，从$b_{ rac{1}{2}}$递推，所得各项之和与$J_{ rac{1}{2}}(x)$线性相关，故忽略不计，只取从$b_{- rac{1}{2}}$开始递推的项，得

$$b_k=(-1)^{k+ rac{1}{2}} rac{b_{- rac{1}{2}}}{(k+\displaystyle rac{1}{2})!}$$

  通常取$b_{- rac{1}{2}}=\displaystyle\sqrt{ rac{2}{\pi}}$，得第二个特解

$$J_{- rac{1}{2}}(x)=\sqrt{ rac{2}{\pi x}}\cos{x}$$

  用同种方法可求得$l eq 0$时有

$$J_{l+ rac{1}{2}}(x)=\sum_{k=0}^\infty(-1)^k rac{1}{k!\Gamma(l+ rac{1}{2}+k+1)}\left( rac{x}{2} ight)^{l+ rac{1}{2}+2k}\
J_{-(l+ rac{1}{2})}(x)=\sum_{k=0}^\infty(-1)^k rac{1}{k!\Gamma(-l- rac{1}{2}+k+1)}\left( rac{x}{2} ight)^{-l- rac{1}{2}+2k}$$

  $s_1-s_2=2 u=2m\qquad m=0,1,2\cdots\quad$时，$ u$阶贝塞尔方程成为
$x^2y’’+xy’+(x^2-m^2)y=0$，大根$s_1=m$对应特解为$m$阶贝塞尔函数

$$J_m(x)=\sum_{k=0}^\infty(-1)^k rac{1}{k!\Gamma(m+k+1)}\left( rac{x}{2} ight)^{m+2k}$$

  与之前连带勒让德函数类似，取$-m$得特解$-m$阶贝塞尔函数

$$J_{-m}(x)=\sum_{k=0}^\infty(-1)^k rac{1}{k!\Gamma(-m+k+1)}\left( rac{x}{2} ight)^{-m+2k}$$

  观察知，$J_m(x)=(-1)^mJ_{-m}(x)$，因此$J_m(x)$不能作为第二个线性独立的特解，仍需从如下形式出发

$$y_2(x)=AJ_m(x)\ln{x}+\sum_{k=0}^\infty b_kx^{-m+k}$$

  将此形式代入贝塞尔方程得

$$2AxJ_m’(x)+\sum_{k=0}^\infty[(-m+k)^2-m^2]b_kx^{-m+k}+\sum_{k=2}^\infty b_{k-2}x^{-m+k}=0$$

  由于$2AxJ_m’(x)$最低次幂为$x^m$项，故在$k<2m$时只需考虑后两项之和，此时得递推关系$b_1=0,[(-m+k)^2-m^2]b_k+b_{k-2}=0$，与$- u$阶贝塞尔方程相同，故可得

$$b_{2n}= rac{(-1)^n}{2^{2n}} rac{1}{n!(-m+1)(-m+2)\cdots(-m+n)}b_0\
\quad\
b_{2n+1}=0$$

  $k=2m$时，有$\displaystyle A rac{m}{m!2^{m-1}}+b_{2m-2}=0$，即$\displaystyle A=- rac{2m}{m!2^m}b_0$

  由于$2AxJ_m’(x)$仅含$m+2n$次幂，故$k=2m+2n+1$时，$b_k=0$

  当$k=2m+2n$时，得到递推式

$$(-1)^{n+1} rac{4m(m+2n)}{m!n!(m+n)!2^{2m+2n}}b_0+4n(m+n)b_{2m+2n}+b_{2m+2n-2}=0$$

  利用累加求得通项

$$ rac{m(m+2)}{(m!)^21(m+1)2^{2m}}b_0+4\cdot 1! rac{(m+1)!}{m!}b_{2m+2}+b_{2m}=0\\\quad\\ rac{m(m+4)}{(m!)^22(m+2)2^{2m}}b_0-4^2\cdot 2! rac{(m+2)!}{m!}b_{2m+4}-4\cdot 1! rac{(m+1)!}{m!}b_{2m+2}=0\\\quad\\ rac{m(m+6)}{(m!)^23(m+3)2^{2m}}b_0+4^3\cdot 3! rac{(m+3)!}{m!}b_{2m+6}-4^2\cdot 2! rac{(m+2)!}{m!}b_{2m+4}=0\qquad\\\quad\\\cdots\\\quad\\ rac{m(m+2n)}{(m!)^2n(m+n)2^{2m}}b_0+(-1)^{n-1}4^n\cdot n! rac{(m+n)!}{m!}b_{2m+2n}+(-1)^{n-1}4^{n-1}\cdot 2! rac{(m+n-1)!}{m!}b_{2m+2n-2}=0$$

$$ rac{mb_0}{(m!)^22^{2m}}\sum_{k=1}^n rac{m+2k}{k(m+k)}+(-1)^{n-1}2^{2n}n! rac{(m+n)!}{m!}b_{2m+2n}+b_{2m}=0\
\quad\
b_{2m+2n}=(-1)^n rac{mb_0}{m!n!(m+n)!2^{2m+2n}}\sum_{k=1}^n\left( rac{1}{k}+ rac{1}{m+k} ight)\
+(-1)^n rac{m!}{2^{2n}n!(m+n)!}b_{2m}$$

  后一项系数与$J_m(x)$系数线性相关，故忽略不计，即取$b_{2m}=0$，通常取$b_0=\displaystyle- rac{m!2^m}{m\pi}$，由此得到第二个线性独立特解

$$y_2(x)= rac{2}{\pi}J_m(x)\ln{x}- rac{1}{\pi}\sum_{n=0}^{m-1} rac{(m-n-1)!}{n!}\left( rac{x}{2} ight)^{-m+2n}\- rac{1}{\pi}\sum_{n=1}^\infty rac{(-1)^n}{n!(m+n)!}\left[\sum_{k=1}^n\left( rac{1}{k}+ rac{1}{m+k} ight) ight]\left( rac{x}{2} ight)^{m+2n}$$

  将此特解与$\displaystyle\left[ rac{2}{\pi}(\gamma-\ln{2})- rac{1}{\pi}\sum_{k=1}^m rac{1}{k} ight]J_m(x)$的和称为$m$阶诺伊曼函数，记作$N_m(x)$，引入$\Gamma$函数的对数导数$\psi(x)=\displaystyle rac{\Gamma’(x)}{\Gamma(x)}$，继续化简

$$N_m(x)= rac{2}{\pi}J_m(x)\ln{ rac{x}{2}}- rac{1}{\pi}\sum_{n=0}^{m-1} rac{(m-n-1)!}{n!}\left( rac{x}{2} ight)^{-m+2n}\- rac{1}{\pi}\sum_{n=0}^\infty rac{(-1)^n}{n!(m+n)!}\left(\sum_{k=1}^n rac{1}{k}+\sum_{k=1}^{m+n} rac{1}{k}-2\gamma ight)\left( rac{x}{2} ight)^{m+2n}\
\quad\
\
\quad\
= rac{2}{\pi}J_m(x)\ln{ rac{x}{2}}- rac{1}{\pi}\sum_{n=0}^{m-1} rac{(m-n-1)!}{n!}\left( rac{x}{2} ight)^{-m+2n}\- rac{1}{\pi}\sum_{n=0}^\infty rac{(-1)^n}{n!(m+n)!}[\psi(m+n+1)+\psi(n+1)]\left( rac{x}{2} ight)^{m+2n}\$$

  $m=0$时，可以验证零阶贝塞尔方程的第二个线性独立解仍满足上述形式，得到零阶诺伊曼函数$N_0(x)$

$$N_0(x)= rac{2}{\pi}J_0(x)\ln{ rac{x}{2}}- rac{2}{\pi}\sum_{n=0}^\infty rac{(-1)^2}{(n!)^2}\psi(n+1)\left( rac{x}{2} ight)^{2n}$$

  直接对$ u$阶诺伊曼函数取整数阶极限亦可得到上述形式

$$\lim_{ u o m}N_ u(x)=\lim_{ u o m} rac{J_ u(x)\cos{ u\pi}-J_{- u(x)}}{\sin{ u\pi}}\
\quad\
=\lim_{ u o m} rac{1}{\pi}\left[ rac{\partial J_ u(x)}{\partial u}-(-1)^m rac{\partial J_{- u}(x)}{\partial u} ight]\
\quad\
\small\color{orange}{待补全}$$

  对于虚宗量贝塞尔方程$\displaystyle x^2 rac{\dd^2 R}{\dd x^2}+x rac{\dd R}{\dd x}-(x^2+ u^2)R=0$，作代换$\xi=ix$，方程化为贝塞尔方程$\displaystyle \xi^2 rac{\dd^2 R}{\dd \xi^2}+\xi rac{\dd R}{\dd \xi}+(\xi^2- u^2)R=0$，方程通解为$J_ u(\xi)$，将$i^{- u}J_ u(ix)$称为$ u$阶虚宗量贝塞尔函数，记作$I_ u(x)$

$$I_ u(x)=\sum_{k=0}^\infty rac{1}{k!\Gamma( u+k+1)}\left( rac{x}{2} ight)^{ u+2k}$$

  $ u$不为整数时，其第二个线性独立解为$- u$阶虚宗量贝塞尔函数

$$I_{- u}(x)=\sum_{k=0}^\infty rac{1}{k!\Gamma(- u+k+1)}\left( rac{x}{2} ight)^{- u+2k}$$

  $ u$为整数$m$时，$I_{-m}(x)=I_{m}(x)$，$I_{-m}(x)$不能作为第二个线性独立解

  引入第一种和第二种$ u$阶汉克尔函数

$$H_ u^{(1)}(x)=J_ u(x)+iN_ u(x)\
\quad\ H_ u(x)^{(2)}=J_ u(x)-iN_ u(x)$$

  则$H_ u^{(1)}(x)$和$H_ u(x)^{(2)}$也可作为贝塞尔方程两个线性独立的解，对于虚宗量贝塞尔方程，将$\displaystyle rac{\pi ie^{i u\pi/2}}{2}H_ u^{(1)}(ix)= rac{\pi}{2} rac{I_{- u}(x)-I_{ u}(x)}{\sin{ u\pi}}$称为$ u$阶虚宗量汉克尔函数，记作$K_ u(x)$

  当$ u$为整数$m$时

$$K_m(x)= rac{\pi i^{m+1}}{2}[J_m(ix)+iN_m(ix)]$$

entry.title: Jupyter
