这样虽然能够还原最初的形状，但是计算的时间复杂度是$O(N^4)$，随着$N$增大计算耗时迅速增加，也会带来更大的舍入误差。

Fast Fourier Transform(FFT)

如上所见，按照定义来进行离散傅里叶变换很不划算，在实际应用起不到太大的作用，这于是催生了许多高效的离散傅里叶变换算法，统称为快速傅里叶变换，最早的一种基于单位根与多项式性质实现的FFT，称为Cooley-Tukey算法，如下只介绍2-FFT亦即只适用于$M$为2的幂情况下的FFT

Cooley-Tukey算法

首先考虑一维的离散傅里叶变换，为简便起见，令其系数为1

$$g(u)=\sum\limits_{x=0}^{M-1}f(x)e^{-2\pi i \frac{xu}{M}}$$

用$W_M$来表示$M$次单位根，即$e^{-\frac{2\pi i}{M}}$，容易得到如下性质

$$1.周期性\quad W_M^{k+M}=W_M^k\\
\quad\\
2.对称性\quad W_M^{k+\frac{M}{2}}=-W_M^k\\
\quad\\
3.可约性\quad W_M^{mk}=W_{\frac{M}{m}}^k
$$

将$g$用单位根来表示

$$g(u)=\sum\limits_{x=0}^{M-1}f(x)W_{M}^{xu}$$

接下来的变换就是FFT的核心思想：将长序列化为短序列的和。对$g$进行一次如下的奇偶拆分

$$\begin{aligned}g(u)&=\sum\limits_{x=2t}^{M-1}f(x)W_{M}^{xu}+\sum\limits_{x=2t+1}^{M-1}f(x)W_{M}^{xu}\\
\quad\\
&=\sum\limits_{t=0}^{\frac{M}{2}-1}f(2t)W_{\frac{M}{2}}^{tu}+W_{M}^{u}\sum\limits_{t=0}^{\frac{M}{2}-1}f(2t+1)W_{\frac{M}{2}}^{tu}\\
\quad\\
&=g_{even}(u)+W_{M}^{u}g_{odd}(u)
\end{aligned}
$$

因为应用了可约性，周期变为原来的一半，这样我们只能算出$u$序列中前一半的值，这时我们便可利用单位根的周期性与对称性，进行如下操作，让所有的$u$都有相对应的变换

$$
g(u)=g_{even}(u)+W_{M}^{u}g_{odd}(u)\\
\quad\\
g(u+\frac{M}{2})=g_{even}(u)-W_{M}^{u}g_{odd}(u)
$$

于是我们将序列长度为$M$的变换拆成了两个长度为$\frac{M}{2}$的变换，由主定理可知其时间复杂度为$O(Mlog(M))$，如此迭代下去，最终可以让每个DFT的序列长度为1，DFT即其本身，我们只需确定最后一层$x$序列的顺序即可。观察上面的奇偶拆分，如果初始$x$序列中某个位置的二进制末位为零，则将此位置对应的元素移动到前一半序列中，亦即二进制首位变为零，如果倒数第二位又为零，则将其移动到前四分之一序列中，亦即二进制第二位变为零，不难发现，最终的$x$序列中各元素编号即为初始的$x$序列中对应元素编号的二进制反转，这样我们就能由最后一层$x$反推出第一层$x$的傅里叶变换。按照这个思路，我们就可以写出如下一维FFT与IFFT的python代码，为保证对称性，在FFT之前加上一个系数$\frac{1}{\sqrt{M}}$

def ib(i, N):   #二进制反转    return int(            ('0' * (len(str(bin(N - 1))) - len(str(bin(i))))            +str(bin(i))[2::])            [::-1], 2)  def W(N, k):    #单位根    return complex(np.cos(2 * PI * k / N), -np.sin(2 * PI * k / N))def FFT(f):    N = len(f)    g = [0] * N    for i in range(N):        g[ib(i, N)] = f[i]    for i in range(int(np.log2(N))):    #遍历每层        L = [0] * N        n = 1 << i        m = N >> (i + 1)        for j in range(m):  #遍历每块            for k in range(n):  #遍历各块中的元素                L[j * n * 2 +k] = g[j * n * 2 + k] + W(2 * n, k) * g[j * n * 2 + k + n]                L[j * n * 2 + k +n] = g[j * n * 2 + k] - W(2 * n, k) * g[j * n * 2 + k + n]        g = L    return np.array(g)/np.sqrt(N)def IFFT(f):    G=np.conjugate(f)   #取共轭    return np.conjugate(FFT(G)) #再次取共轭

实现了一维的FFT，二维以及更高维的FFT也就可以分解为许多一维FFT的复合

$$g(u)=FFT(f)=\frac{1}{\sqrt{M}}\sum\limits_{x=0}^{M-1}f(x)e^{-2\pi i \frac{xu}{M}}\\
\quad\\
f(x)=IFFT(g)=\overline{FFT(\bar{g})}\\
\quad\\
\begin{aligned}\quad g(u,v)&=FFT2(f)=\frac{1}{\sqrt{MN}}\sum\limits_{x=0}^{M-1}\sum\limits_{y=0}^{N-1}f(x,y)e^{-2\pi i(\frac{x u}{M}+\frac{y v}{N})}\\
\quad\\
&=\frac{1}{\sqrt{M}}\sum\limits_{x=0}^{M-1}(\frac{1}{\sqrt{N}}\sum\limits_{y=0}^{N-1}f(x,y)e^{-2\pi i \frac{y v}{N}})e^{-2\pi i \frac{x u}{M}}\\
\quad\\
&=FFT_y(FFT_x(f))\\
\end{aligned}\\
\quad\\
f(x,y)=IFFT2(g)=\overline{FFT2(\bar{g})}
$$

写出FFT2的python代码如下

def FFT2(f):    M,N=len(f),len(f[0])    G=np.empty(dtype=complex,shape=(M,N))    for j in range(M):        G[j]=FFT(f[j])    G=G.T    for i in range(N):        G[i]=FFT(G[i])    return G.Tdef IFFT2(f):    G=np.conjugate(f)    return np.conjugate(FFT2(G))

利用FFT2可以去除图像中特定空间频率的成分，以下是对图像分别进行高通滤波与低通滤波所得到的结果

还可以达到将铁栅栏变成玻璃栅栏的效果

参考与引用来源

鹤翔万里高中做的视频
维基百科

entry.title: Salamin-Brent算法
entry.content:
$\qquad$Arithmetic-Geometric Mean:给定两个正数$a$和$b$$,\ $且有$0<b<a.\;$令$a_0=a,\ b_0=b,\ $并按照递推公式

$$
a_n= rac{a_{n-1}+b_{n-1}}{2},\;
b_n=\sqrt{a_{n-1}b_{n-1}},\;
n\in \mathbb{N_+}
$$

定义数列$\{a_n\}$和$\{b_n\}.\;$证明这两个数列收敛于同一个极限$,\ $此极限称为$a$与$b$的算术几何平均值$,\ $且其具有解析表达式

$$AGM(a,b)= rac{\pi}{2I(a,b)}\
\quad\
其中\;I(a,b)=\int^{ rac{\pi}{2}}_{0} rac{ ext{d}x}{\sqrt{a^2\cos^2{x}+b^2\sin^2{x}}}$$

$ abla$证
$$使用数学归纳法\\\quad\\a_0>b_0\\\quad\\a_n^2-b_n^2=( rac{a_{n-1}-b_{n-1}}{2})^2>0\\\quad\\则有 b = b_0 < b_1 < b_2 < \cdots < b_n < a_n < \cdots < a_2 < a_1 < a_0 = a\\\quad\\\{a_n\}与\{b_n\}单调有界，设其极限分别为A与B\\\quad\\由递推式a_n= rac{a_{n-1}+b_{n-1}}{2}有A= rac{A+B}{2}\\\quad\\即\{a_n\}与\{b_n\}收敛于同一极限A=B，设其为AGM(a,b)\\\quad\\ ext{Gauss}在14岁(1791年)时求出其解析表达式为\\\quad\\AGM(a,b)= rac{\pi}{2I(a,b)},其中I(a,b)=\int^{ rac{\pi}{2}}_{0} rac{ ext{d}x}{\sqrt{a^2\cos^2{x}+b^2\sin^2{x}}}\\\quad\\主要思路是证明I(a,b)=I(a_1,b_1),不断迭代,由I函数的连续性得\\\quad\\I=\lim \limits_{n o \infty}I(a_n,b_n)=I(AGM,AGM)=\int^{ rac{\pi}{2}}_{0} rac{ ext{d}x}{AGM}= rac{\pi}{2AGM}\\\quad\\他首先引进变量x',使得\sin{x'}= rac{2a\sin{x}}{a+b+(a-b)\sin^2{x}}\\\quad\\ ext{Gauss then asserts}\\\quad\\`` ext{after the development has been made correctly, it will be seen}"\\\quad\\ ext{that} \quad rac{ ext{d}x}{\sqrt{a^2\cos^2{x}+b^2\sin^2{x}}}= rac{ ext{d}x'}{\sqrt{a_1^2\cos^2{x'}+b_1^2\sin^2{x'}}}\\\quad\\除了 ext{Gauss}的方法，不妨试下 ext{D.J. Newmann}的代换\quad\\t=b an{x},t'= rac{1}{2}(t- rac{b_1^2}{t})\\\quad\\则 ext{d}x= rac{\cos^2{x} ext{d}t}{b}, ext{d}t= rac{2t^2 ext{d}t'}{t^2+b_1^2}\\\quad\\ egin{aligned}I(a,b)&=\int^{+\infty}_{0} rac{\cos^2{x} ext{d}t}{b\sqrt{a^2\cos^2{x}+b^2\sin^2{x}}}\\&=\int^{+\infty}_{0} rac{ ext{d}t}{\sqrt{ rac{b^2}{\cos^2{x}}(a^2+b^2 an^2{x})}}\\&=\int^{+\infty}_{0} rac{ ext{d}t}{\sqrt{(b^2+t^2)(a^2+t^2)}}\\&=\int^{+\infty}_{-\infty} rac{2t^2 ext{d}t'}{(t^2+b_1^2)\sqrt{b_1^4+(4a_1^2-2b_1^2)t^2+t^4}}\\&=\int^{+\infty}_{-\infty} rac{ ext{d}t'}{ rac{t^2+b_1^2}{t}\sqrt{[b_1^4+(4a_1^2-2b_1^2)t^2+t^4]/4t^2}}\\&=\int^{+\infty}_{-\infty} rac{ ext{d}t'}{2\sqrt{(a_1^2+t'^2)(b_1^2+t'^2)}}\\&=I(a_1,b_1)\\\end{aligned}$$
$\qquad\\$

$\qquad$Landen变换:先引进如下两个完全椭圆积分

$$K(k)=\int^{ rac{\pi}{2}}_{0} rac{ ext{d}x}{\sqrt{1-k^2\sin^2{x}}},\;E(k)=\int^{ rac{\pi}{2}}_{0}\sqrt{1-k^2\sin^2{x}}\; ext{d}x\\\quad\\当k^2+k'^2=1时\\\quad\\K'(k)=K(k'),\;E'(k)=E(k')为另外两个椭圆积分\\\quad\\这些椭圆积分的对称形式可写为\\\quad\\I(a,b)=\int^{ rac{\pi}{2}}_{0} rac{ ext{d}x}{\sqrt{a^2\cos^2{x}+b^2\sin^2{x}}}\\\quad\\J(a,b)=\int^{ rac{\pi}{2}}_{0}\sqrt{a^2\cos^2{x}+b^2\sin^2{x}}\; ext{d}x\\\quad\\很明显\;I(a,b)= rac{K'( rac{b}{a})}{a},\;J(a,b)=aE'( rac{b}{a})\\\quad\\进行 ext{Landen}变换可得到如下的式子\\\quad\\I(a_n,b_n)=I(a_{n+1},b_{n+1})\\\quad\\J(a_n,b_n)=2J(a_{n+1},b_{n+1})-a_n b_n I(a_{n+1},b_{n+1})\\$$
$ abla$证
$$第一个式子在算术几何平均值中已经证过\\\quad\\J(a,b)关于a与b的对称性是显然的\\\quad\\这样第二个式子同样可以运用 ext{D.J. Newmann}的代换得出\\\quad\\t=b an{x},t'= rac{1}{2}(t- rac{b_1^2}{t})\\\quad\\ egin{aligned}J(a,b)&=\int^{ rac{\pi}{2}}_{0}\sqrt{a^2\cos^2{x}+b^2\sin^2{x}}\; ext{d}x\\&=\int^{+\infty}_{0} rac{\sqrt{(a^2+t^2)(b^2+t^2)}}{(b+ rac{t^2}{b})^2}\; ext{d}t\\&=\int^{+\infty}_{-\infty} rac{\sqrt{(a^2+t^2)(b^2+t^2)}}{(b+ rac{t^2}{b})^2} imes rac{2t^2}{b_1^2+t^2}\; ext{d}t'\\&=\int^{+\infty}_{-\infty} rac{(b_1^2+t^2)\sqrt{(a^2+t^2)(b^2+t^2)}}{2t^2(b_1+ rac{t'^2}{b_1})^2} imes[ rac{2t^2(b_1+ rac{t'^2}{b_1})}{(b_1^2+t^2)(b+ rac{t^2}{b})}]^2\; ext{d}t'\\&[注意到\; b_1^2+t'^2= rac{(b_1^2+t^2)^2}{4t^2},\;a_1^2+t'^2= rac{(a^2+t^2)(b^2+t^2)}{4t^2}]\\&=\int^{+\infty}_{-\infty} rac{2\sqrt{(a_1^2+t'^2)(b_1^2+t'^2)}}{(b_1+ rac{t'^2}{b_1})^2} imes rac{t^2(b_1+ rac{t'^2}{b_1})^2}{(b_1^2+t'^2)(b+ rac{t^2}{b})^2}\; ext{d}t'\\&=\int^{+\infty}_{-\infty} rac{2\sqrt{(a_1^2+t'^2)(b_1^2+t'^2)}}{(b_1+ rac{t'^2}{b_1})^2} imes rac{b^2t^2(b_1+ rac{t'^2}{b_1})^2(a^2+t^2)}{4t^2(b_1^2+t'^2)(a_1^2+t'^2)(b^2+t^2)}\; ext{d}t'\\&=\int^{+\infty}_{-\infty} rac{2\sqrt{(a_1^2+t'^2)(b_1^2+t'^2)}}{(b_1+ rac{t'^2}{b_1})^2} imes rac{ab(b_1+ rac{t'^2}{b_1})^2}{4(a_1^2+t'^2)(b_1^2+t'^2)} imes rac{b(a^2+t^2)}{a(b^2+t^2)}\; ext{d}t'\\&=\int^{+\infty}_{-\infty} rac{2\sqrt{(a_1^2+t'^2)(b_1^2+t'^2)}}{(b_1+ rac{t'^2}{b_1})^2} imes rac{ab(b_1+ rac{t'^2}{b_1})^2}{4(a_1^2+t'^2)(b_1^2+t'^2)}\\& imes[-1+ rac{(a+b)ab+(a+b)t^2}{a(b^2+t^2)}]\; ext{d}t'\\&=-abI(a_1,b_1)+\int^{+\infty}_{-\infty} rac{2\sqrt{(a_1^2+t'^2)(b_1^2+t'^2)}}{(b_1+ rac{t'^2}{b_1})^2} imes rac{b_1^2+t'^2}{4(a_1^2+t'^2)}\\& imes rac{(a+b)ab+(a+b)t^2}{a(b^2+t^2)}]\; ext{d}t'\\&=-abI(a_1,b_1)+\int^{+\infty}_{-\infty} rac{\sqrt{(a_1^2+t'^2)(b_1^2+t'^2)}}{(b_1+ rac{t'^2}{b_1})^2} imes rac{a_1(b_1^2+t^2)(b_1^2+t'^2)}{a(b^2+t^2)(a_1^2+t'^2)}\; ext{d}t'\\&[利用J(a,b)关于a与b的对称性,由于t是t'与b_1的函数,故无需改变]\\&=-abI(a_1,b_1)+\int^{+\infty}_{-\infty} rac{\sqrt{(a_1^2+t'^2)(b_1^2+t'^2)}}{(b_1+ rac{t'^2}{b_1})^2} imes rac{a_1(b_1^2+t^2)(b_1^2+t'^2)}{(a_1^2+t'^2)}\\& imes[ rac{1}{2a{(b^2+t^2)}}+ rac{1}{2b(a^2+t^2)}]\; ext{d}t'\\&=-abI(a_1,b_1)+\int^{+\infty}_{-\infty} rac{\sqrt{(a_1^2+t'^2)(b_1^2+t'^2)}}{(b_1+ rac{t'^2}{b_1})^2} imes rac{a_1^2(b_1^2+t'^2)^2}{b_1^2(a_1^2+t'^2)^2}\; ext{d}t'\\&=-abI(a_1,b_1)+\int^{+\infty}_{-\infty} rac{\sqrt{(a_1^2+t'^2)(b_1^2+t'^2)}}{(a_1+ rac{t'^2}{a_1})^2}\; ext{d}t'\\&[利用J(a_1,b_1)关于a_1与b_1的对称性]\\&=2J(a_1,b_1)-abI(a_1,b_1)\\\end{aligned}$$

$$
于是I(a,b)= rac{\pi}{2AGM(a,b)}\
\quad\
egin{aligned}
J(a,b)&=2J(a_1,b_1)-abI(a,b)\
\quad\
&=2J(a_1,b_1)+(a^2-2a_1^2+2a_1^2-a^2-b_1^2)I(a,b)\
\quad\
\end{aligned}
\quad\
\Downarrow\
egin{aligned}
J(a,b)-a^2I(a,b)&=2(J(a_1,b_1)-a_1^2I(a_1,b_1))- rac{a^2-b^2}{2}I(a,b)\
\quad\
&=\lim\limits_{n o \infty}[2^n(J(a_n,b_n)-a_n^2I(a_n,b_n))]\
\quad\
&-\lim\limits_{n o \infty}[\sum\limits_{i=0}^{n-1}2^i rac{a_i^2-b_i^2}{2}I(a_i,b_i)]\
\quad\
&=\lim \limits_{n o \infty}\int_{0}^{2^{n-1}\pi}\sqrt{a_n^2\cos^2{x}+b_n^2\sin^2{x}}\; ext{d}x\
\quad\
&-\lim \limits_{n o \infty}\int_{0}^{2^{n-1}\pi} rac{a_n^2}{\sqrt{a_n^2\cos^2{x}+b_n^2\sin^2{x}}}\; ext{d}x\
\quad\
&-\lim\limits_{n o \infty}[\sum\limits_{i=0}^{n-1}2^i rac{a_i^2-b_i^2}{2}I(a_i,b_i)]\
\quad\
&=\int_{0}^{+\infty}(AGM-AGM)\; ext{d}x\
\quad\
&-\sum\limits_{i=0}^{\infty}2^i rac{a_i^2-b_i^2}{2}I(a_i,b_i)\
\quad\
&=-\sum\limits_{i=0}^{\infty}2^i rac{a_i^2-b_i^2}{2}I(a_i,b_i)\
\quad\
\end{aligned}
\quad\
故J(a,b)=[a^2- rac{1}{2}\sum\limits_{i=0}^{\infty}2^i(a_i^2-b_i^2)]I(a,b)
$$

$\qquad$Legendre关系:对于上述两种完全椭圆积分成立等式

$$
K(k)E’(k)+K’(k)E(k)-K(k)K’(k)= rac{\pi}{2}
$$

$ abla$证
$$ egin{aligned}令P(k)&=K(k)E'(k)+K'(k)E(k)-K(k)K'(k)\\&=\int_{0}^{ rac{\pi}{2}} rac{ ext{d}x}{\sqrt{1-k^2\sin^2{x}}}\int_{0}^{ rac{\pi}{2}}\sqrt{1-(1-k^2)\sin^2{x}}\; ext{d}x\\&+\int_{0}^{ rac{\pi}{2}} rac{ ext{d}x}{\sqrt{1-(1-k^2)\sin^2{x}}}\int_{0}^{ rac{\pi}{2}}\sqrt{1-k^2\sin^2{x}}\; ext{d}x\\&-\int_{0}^{ rac{\pi}{2}} rac{ ext{d}x}{\sqrt{1-k^2\sin^2{x}}}\int_{0}^{ rac{\pi}{2}} rac{ ext{d}x}{\sqrt{1-(1-k^2)\sin^2{x}}}\\\end{aligned}\quad\\易得P(0)=P(1)= rac{\pi}{2}\\quad\\只需 rac{ ext{d}P}{ ext{d}k}=0即可证明等式成立\\\quad\\ egin{aligned}又 rac{ ext{d}K}{ ext{d}k}&=\int_{0}^{ rac{\pi}{2}} rac{k\sin^2{x} ext{d}x}{\sqrt{1-k^2\sin^2{x}}^3}\\&=\int_{0}^{ rac{\pi}{2}} rac{(k\sin^2{x}- rac{1}{k}+ rac{1}{k}) ext{d}x}{\sqrt{1-k^2\sin^2{x}}^3}\\&=- rac{1}{k}K+ rac{1}{k}\int_{0}^{ rac{\pi}{2}} rac{ ext{d}x}{\sqrt{1-k^2\sin^2{x}}^3}\\&[泰勒展开，逐项积分]\\&=- rac{1}{k}K+ rac{\pi}{2k}[1+3( rac{1}{2})^2k^2+5( rac{1\cdot3}{2\cdot4})^2k^4+\cdots]\\&=- rac{1}{k}K+ rac{\pi}{2k}[1+ rac{1\cdot3}{1}( rac{1}{2})^2k^2+ rac{3\cdot5}{3}( rac{1\cdot3}{2\cdot4})^2k^4+\cdots]\\&=- rac{1}{k}K+ rac{\pi}{2kk'^2}[1+ rac{1\cdot3-2\cdot2}{1}( rac{1}{2})^2k^2+ rac{3\cdot5-4\cdot4}{3}( rac{1\cdot3}{2\cdot4})^2k^4+\cdots]\\&= rac{1}{kk'^2}E- rac{1}{k}K\\\end{aligned}\quad\\ egin{aligned} rac{ ext{d}E}{ ext{d}k}&=-\int_{0}^{ rac{\pi}{2}} rac{k\sin^2{x} ext{d}x}{\sqrt{1-k^2\sin^2{x}}}\\&=-\int_{0}^{ rac{\pi}{2}} rac{(k\sin^2{x}- rac{1}{k}+ rac{1}{k}) ext{d}x}{\sqrt{1-k^2\sin^2{x}}}\\&= rac{1}{k}E- rac{1}{k}K\\\end{aligned}\quad\\由对称性\\\quad\\ egin{aligned} rac{ ext{d}K'}{ ext{d}k}&= rac{ ext{d}K'}{ ext{d}k'} rac{ ext{d}k'}{ ext{d}k}\\&=( rac{1}{k'k^2}E'- rac{1}{k'}K')(- rac{k}{k'})\\&=- rac{1}{kk'^2}E'+ rac{k}{k'^2}K'\\\end{aligned}\quad\\ egin{aligned} rac{ ext{d}E'}{ ext{d}k}&= rac{ ext{d}E'}{ ext{d}k'} rac{ ext{d}k'}{ ext{d}k}\\&=( rac{1}{k'}E'- rac{1}{k'}K')(- rac{k}{k'})\\&=- rac{k}{k'^2}E'+ rac{k}{k'^2}K'\\\end{aligned}\quad\\ egin{aligned}于是 rac{ ext{d}P}{ ext{d}k}&= rac{ ext{d}K}{ ext{d}k}E'+K rac{ ext{d}E'}{ ext{d}k}+ rac{ ext{d}K'}{ ext{d}k}E+K' rac{ ext{d}E}{ ext{d}k}- rac{ ext{d}K'}{ ext{d}k}K-K' rac{ ext{d}K}{ ext{d}k}\\&=( rac{1}{kk'^2}E- rac{1}{k}K)E'+K(- rac{k}{k'^2}E'+ rac{k}{k'^2}K')+(- rac{1}{kk'^2}E'+ rac{k}{k'^2}K')E\\&+K'( rac{1}{k}E- rac{1}{k}K)-(- rac{1}{kk'^2}E'+ rac{k}{k'^2}K')K-K'( rac{1}{kk'^2}E- rac{1}{k}K)\\&=( rac{1}{kk'^2}- rac{1}{kk'^2})EE'+( rac{k}{k'^2}- rac{1}{k}- rac{k}{k'^2}+ rac{1}{k})KK'\\&+( rac{k}{k'^2}+ rac{1}{k}- rac{1}{kk'^2})EK'+(- rac{1}{k}- rac{k}{k'^2}+ rac{1}{kk'^2})KE'\\&=0\end{aligned}$$
$\qquad\\$

$\qquad$$\pi$的表达式:令$k= rac{a}{b}$、$k’= rac{a’}{b’},$将勒让德关系中的$E$、$K$用$I$、$J$代换可得

$$
rac{a’}{a}I(a’,b’)J(a,b)+ rac{a}{a’}I(a,b)J(a’,b’)-aa’I(a,b)I(a’,b’)= rac{\pi}{2}\
\quad\
再将 ext{Landen}变换得出的以下两个式子代入\
\quad\
I(a,b)= rac{\pi}{2AGM(a,b)}\
\quad\
J(a,b)=[a^2- rac{1}{2}\sum\limits_{i=0}^{\infty}2^i(a_i^2-b_i^2)]I(a,b)\
\quad\
可得
\quad\
egin{aligned}
& rac{a’}{a}[a^2- rac{1}{2}\sum\limits_{i=0}^{\infty}2^i(a_i^2-b_i^2)] rac{1}{2AGM(a,b)AGM(a’,b’)}+\
\quad\
& rac{a}{a’}[a’^2- rac{1}{2}\sum\limits_{i=0}^{\infty}2^i(a_{i}’^2-b_{i}’^2)] rac{1}{2AGM(a,b)AGM(a’,b’)}-\
\quad\
&aa’ rac{1}{2AGM(a,b)AGM(a’,b’)}\
\quad\
&= rac{1}{\pi}\
\end{aligned}
\quad\
若令a=a’=1,\
\quad\
b=k,\;b’=k’,\
\quad\
a_i^2-b_i^2=c_i^2,\;a_{i}’^2-b_{i}’=c_{i}’^2则有\
\quad\
\pi= rac{4AGM(1,k)AGM(1,k’)}{1-\sum\limits_{i=1}^{\infty}2^i(c_{i}^2+c_{i}’^2)}\
\quad\
进一步令k=k’= rac{1}{\sqrt{2}}则有\
\quad\
\pi= rac{4[AGM(1, rac{1}{\sqrt{2}})]^2}{1-\sum\limits_{i=1}^{\infty}2^{i+1}c_{i}^2}
$$

$\qquad$Salamin-Brent算法:令$a_0=1,\ b_0= rac{1}{\sqrt{2}},\ s_0= rac{1}{2},\ $并用递推公式

$$ egin{aligned}&a_n= rac{a_{n-1}+b_{n-1}}{2},\\&b_n=\sqrt{a_{n-1}b_{n-1}},\\&s_n=s_{n-1}-2^n(a_n^2-b_n^2),\\&p_n= rac{2a_n^2}{s_n}\end{aligned}$$

作迭代$,\ $则$\{p_n\}$收敛于$\pi,\ $这是上文$\pi$表达式的直接结果

$\qquad$误差分析:至此得出了Salamin-Brent算法$,\ $但还需确定该算法中$\pi$的收敛速度$,\ $虽然上文中$\pi$的表达式对任意复数$k$成立$,\ $以下仅就$k$为实数的情况讨论(ToDo)

$$
记a,b第n次与a’,b’第n’迭代的结果为\pi_{nn’}= rac{4a_n a_{n’}’}{1-\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}2^{i}c_{i}^2-\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n’}2^{i}c_{i}’^2}\
\quad\
引入辅助量\overline\pi_{nn’}= rac{4AGM(1,k)AGM(1,k’)}{1-\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}2^{i}c_{i}^2-\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n’}2^{i}c_{i}’^2}\
\quad\
我们需要找出误差上界e_{nn’}与\overline e_{nn’}使得\
\quad\
0<\pi-\overline\pi_{nn’}<e_{nn’}\
\quad\
0<\pi_{nn’}-\overline\pi_{nn’}<\overline e_{nn’}\
\quad\
\overline e_{nn’}<e_{nn’}\
\quad\
由以上三式即可得出|\pi-\pi_{nn’}|<e_{nn’}\
\quad\
egin{aligned}
&\qquad\qquad\qquad\qquad首先计算\pi-\overline\pi_{nn’}\
\quad\
&= rac{4AGM(1,k)AGM(1,k’)}{1-\sum\limits_{i=1}^{\infty}2^i(c_{i}^2+c_{i}’^2)}- rac{4AGM(1,k)AGM(1,k’)}{1-\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}2^{i}c_{i}^2-\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n’}2^{i}c_{i}’^2}\
\quad\
&[由不等式 rac{1}{x}- rac{1}{x+y}< rac{y}{x^2}有]\
\quad\
&<4AGM(1,k)AGM(1,k’) rac{\sum\limits_{i=n+1}^{\infty}2^{i}c_{i}^2+\sum\limits_{i=n’+1}^{\infty}2^{i}c_{i}’^2}
{[1-\sum\limits_{i=1}^{\infty}2^i(c_{i}^2+c_{i}’^2)]^2}\
\quad\
&= rac{\pi^2}{4AGM(1,k)AGM(1,k’)}(\sum\limits_{i=n+1}^{\infty}2^{i}c_{i}^2+\sum\limits_{i=n’+1}^{\infty}2^{i}c_{i}’^2)\
\quad\
&[由c_i= rac{a_{i-1}-b_{i-1}}{2},c_i^2=4a_{i+1}c_{i+1}有]\
\quad\
&= rac{\pi^2}{2AGM(1,k)AGM(1,k’)}(\sum\limits_{i=n+2}^{\infty}2^{i}a_{i}c_{i}+\sum\limits_{i=n’+2}^{\infty}2^{i}a_{i}’c_{i}’)\
\quad\
\end{aligned}
\quad\
于是可记e_{nn’}= rac{\pi^2}{2AGM(1,k)AGM(1,k’)}(\sum\limits_{i=n+2}^{\infty}2^{i}a_{i}c_{i}+\sum\limits_{i=n’+2}^{\infty}2^{i}a_{i}’c_{i}’)\
\quad\
接下来计算\pi_{nn’}-\overline\pi_{nn’}\
\quad\
egin{aligned}
&= rac{4a_n a_{n’}’}{1-\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}2^{i}c_{i}^2-\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n’}2^{i}c_{i}’^2}-
rac{4AGM(1,k)AGM(1,k’)}{1-\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}2^{i}c_{i}^2-\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n’}2^{i}c_{i}’^2}\
\quad\
&< rac{4}{1-\sum\limits_{i=1}^{\infty}2^i(c_{i}^2+c_{i}’^2)}(a_{n}’a_{n’}’-AGM(1,k)AGM(1,k’))\
\quad\
&= rac{\pi}{AGM(1,k)AGM(1,k’)}(a_{n}’a_{n’}’-AGM(1,k)AGM(1,k’))\
\quad\
&=
\end{aligned}
$$

$\qquad$参考与引用来源:

Computation of $\pi$ Using Arithmetic-Geometric Mean
Methods of Mathematical Physics最后一节
From Lintearia to Lemniscate II:Gauss and Landen’s Work
Elliptic Integrals78~80面
The Legendre Relation for Elliptic Integrals
The Quest for Pi
谢惠民第二版上册29与267面
